analyzed: rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba ni mtshan no //
translated: Vajradhara is the name.

original: dka' bas 'dul ba'i phyir gdul dka' ba ste /
analyzed: dka' bas 'dul ba'i phyir gdul dka' ba ste /

analyzed: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'o //

original: de rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na gdul dka' 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na gdul dka' 'dul ba'o //
translated: Since he tames those who are difficult to tame, he is the tamer of the intractable.

original: de lta mod kyi gdul dka' ba ni sred med kyi bu la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yod do zhe na /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi gdul dka' ba ni sred med kyi bu la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yod do zhe na /

original: de'i phyir mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /üîΩgang gi phyir sred med kyi bu la @2a * //üîΩsogs pa rnams kyang gdul dka' 'dul ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mchog ces bya ba gsungs te / gang gi phyir sred med kyi bu la @2a * // sogs pa rnams kyang gdul dka' 'dul ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, he is called supreme.üîΩBecause Narayana and others are also tamers of the intractable,

original: de lta mod kyi de rnams kyis 'dul ba ni lha ma yin 'khor la sogs pa sems can ma rungs pa rnams 'joms pas na gsod par byed par 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi de rnams kyis 'dul ba ni lha ma yin 'khor la sogs pa sems can ma rungs pa rnams 'joms pas na gsod par byed par 'dod pa yin la /
translated: but their taming is killing, since it destroys the wicked beings such as the asura hosts.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gdug pa rnams 'dul ba ni dul bar mdzad par bzhed pas na de'i phyir 'di ni mchog ste dam pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gdug pa rnams 'dul ba ni dul bar mdzad par bzhed pas na de'i phyir 'di ni mchog ste dam pa'o //
translated: But the Blessed One Vajrapani is the tamer of the wicked, since he wishes to tame them. Therefore, he is supreme, the best.

original: 'jig pa thams cad bral bas na dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa thams cad bral bas na dpa' bo'o //
translated: He is the hero, since he is free from all destruction.

original: rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar gyur pas na 'jig rten gsum las rgyal lo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar gyur pas na 'jig rten gsum las rgyal lo //
translated: He is the conqueror of the three worlds, since he has conquered the three worlds in every way.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na rdo rje dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na rdo rje dbang phyug ste /
translated: Since he is the lord of the vajra family, he is the lord of the vajra.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that he is the chief of the Ak·π£obhya family.

original: gsang ba'i rgyal po yin pas na gsang ba'i rgyal po ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i rgyal po yin pas na gsang ba'i rgyal po ste /
translated: Since he is the king of the secret ones, he is the king of the secret ones.

original: de yang de rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis bkug nas bka' nyan pa nyid du 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang de rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis bkug nas bka' nyan pa nyid du 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, he is the one who, having summoned them with their secret mantras, establishes them in the state of obedience.

original: padma rgyas pa dang 'dra ba'i yid 'phrog pa'i spyan gang la yod pa de ni padma rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: padma rgyas pa dang 'dra ba'i yid 'phrog pa'i spyan gang la yod pa de ni padma rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba'o //
translated: He who has eyes that captivate the mind, like a blooming lotus, is the one who has eyes like blooming lotuses.

original: padma yang yin la rgyas pa yang de nyid yin pas na padma rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: padma yang yin la rgyas pa yang de nyid yin pas na padma rgyas pa ste /
translated: Since it is a lotus and it is blooming, it is a blooming lotus.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i zhal gang la yod pa de ni padma rgyas 'dra'i zhal mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i zhal gang la yod pa de ni padma rgyas 'dra'i zhal mnga' ba'o //
translated: He who has a face like that is the one who has a face like a blooming lotus.

original: sems can 'dul ba rnams la gzigs @2b nas khro ba dang bcas par gyur pas na rang gi lag ste /
analyzed: sems can 'dul ba rnams la gzigs @2b nas khro ba dang bcas par gyur pas na rang gi lag ste /
translated: Since he looks upon those to be tamed with sentient beings with wrath, he is the one with his own hand.

original: de nyid kyi phyag gis rdo rje mchog yang dang yang du gsor zhing bskor bar mdzad pas na rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyag gis rdo rje mchog yang dang yang du gsor zhing bskor bar mdzad pas na rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Since he repeatedly brandishes and whirls the supreme vajra with his own hand, it is said ‚Äúwith one‚Äôs own hand‚Äù and so forth.

original: de ltar rdo rje 'chang gi khyad par gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje 'chang gi khyad par gsungs nas /
translated: Having thus described the features of Vajradhara,

original: khro gnyer rim par zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de'i 'khor gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: khro gnyer rim par zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de'i 'khor gsungs pa yin te /
translated: with ‚Äúin a row with frowns‚Äù and so forth, his retinue is described.

original: khro gnyer rim par ldan zhes bya ba ni de'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lag na rdo rje la la zhig dang / de la sogs pa bgrang ba las 'das pa mtha' yas pas de rnams dang lhan cig tu phyag byas zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: khro gnyer rim par ldan zhes bya ba ni de'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lag na rdo rje la la zhig dang / de la sogs pa bgrang ba las 'das pa mtha' yas pas de rnams dang lhan cig tu phyag byas zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn a row with frowns‚Äù refers to some VajrapƒÅ·πáis belonging to his class, and so forth, beyond enumeration, infinite. With those, it is applied, ‚Äúhaving bowed.‚Äù

original: ji ltar zhig ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhig ce na /
translated: How is it?

original: dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúheroic‚Äù and so forth.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba dang 'dra bar 'jigs pa kun dang bral bas na dpa' zhing gdul dka' 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba dang 'dra bar 'jigs pa kun dang bral bas na dpa' zhing gdul dka' 'dul ba'o //
translated: Since he is free from all fear, like Vajradhara, he is heroic, and he subdues the difficult to tame.

original: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can //
analyzed: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can //
translated: Terrifying, heroic,

original: zhes bya ba'i nyams dang ldan pas 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i nyams dang ldan pas 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can te /
translated: The phrase with the experience of being terrifying and heroic means that they are terrifying and heroic.

original: de rnams / rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
analyzed: de rnams / rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
translated: They are armed with the vajra peak,

original: rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa'o //
translated: which they hold in their hands.

original: sems can rnams la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / shes rab dang thabs kyi bya bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phro ba byas te /
analyzed: sems can rnams la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / shes rab dang thabs kyi bya bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phro ba byas te /
translated: They are armed with the vajra peak of the Buddha's offspring, which is the great compassion that focuses on sentient beings, and the activities of wisdom and means.

original: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na 'gro don byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na 'gro don byed pa'o //
translated: They are heroic because they work for the welfare of the world.

original: de nyid kyis 'bras bu 'byung bas na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis 'bras bu 'byung bas na mchog go //
translated: They are supreme because they are the source of the result.

original: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
analyzed: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
translated: They have the attitude of delight, joy, and satisfaction.

original: zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: Here too, the phrase they work for the welfare of the world should be supplied.

original: bsam pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sems la bya la /
analyzed: bsam pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sems la bya la /
translated: The word attitude refers to the mind.

original: de bas na dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'i sems kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'i sems kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, they work for the welfare of the world with a mind that is delighted, joyful, and satisfied.

original: de la gdul dka' ba'i sems can rnams kyi mos pa mthong bas na sems dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de la gdul dka' ba'i sems can rnams kyi mos pa mthong bas na sems dga' ba'o //
translated: Here, the mind is delighted because they see the interest of sentient beings who are difficult to train.

original: ji skad du bstan pa'i chos rnams bstan pa na lan cig gis 'dzin pas na sems mgu ba'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bstan pa'i chos rnams bstan pa na lan cig gis 'dzin pas na sems mgu ba'o //
translated: The mind is pleased because when the teachings are presented as they have been explained, they are grasped at once.

original: de'i don rtogs pas na rangs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don rtogs pas na rangs pa'o //
translated: It is delighted because it understands their meaning.

original: gang gi phyir phyi rol pa'i 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnams ni sems kyi bsam pa'i dbye ba lus sems cha 'dra ba de lta bu dang 'dra ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur gyi bcom ldan 'das de'i thugs gcig pa de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyi rol pa'i 'gro ba'i don byed pa rnams ni sems kyi bsam pa'i dbye ba lus sems cha 'dra ba de lta bu dang 'dra ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur gyi bcom ldan 'das de'i thugs gcig pa de lta ma yin te /
translated: Because the activities of the external world are the result of the differentiation of the mind's intention, the mind is born in a body that is similar to it. But the Bhagavat's mind is not like that, for

original: sems can gdug pa rnams gzigs nas khro bo'i gzugs kyi lus dang ldan par mdzad kyi rang bzhin khro bas ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sems can gdug pa rnams gzigs nas khro bo'i gzugs kyi lus dang ldan par mdzad kyi rang bzhin khro bas ni ma yin gyi /
translated: when he sees wicked beings, he assumes a wrathful form, but not out of natural wrath.

original: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i @3a * //üîΩphyir ro // 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las te /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i @3a * // phyir ro // 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las te /
translated: It is because he has the nature of great compassion.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The activity of the Buddha is the activity of the Buddha, which is the perfection of the perfections, etc.

original: de byed pas na sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'o //
analyzed: de byed pas na sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'o //
translated: Because he performs that, he is the one who performs the activity of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pas ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na mgon po'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pas ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na mgon po'o //
translated: Since he performs the deeds of the Buddha, he is the Lord, and since he is endowed with the power of intuition, he is the Protector.

original: lus btud pa ni lus btud pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: lus btud pa ni lus btud pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Bowing with his body means that he is endowed with bowing with his body.

original: de rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: He together with them means that he is together with them. Having bowed to the Lord means that he has bowed to the Lord.

original: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of Lord?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says the Tathagata, etc.

original: ji tsam du rtogs par bya ba khong du chud pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: ji tsam du rtogs par bya ba khong du chud pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: He is the Tathagata because he has realized the extent of what is to be realized.

original: dngos po thams cad las kun nas mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad las kun nas mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
translated: He is the omniscient one because he has completely and perfectly awakened to all things.

original: de la rab tu dad pas phyag 'tshal nas thal mo legs par sbyar bar byas nas ni /
analyzed: de la rab tu dad pas phyag 'tshal nas thal mo legs par sbyar bar byas nas ni /
translated: Having bowed to him with faith, he joined his palms and,

original: spyan sngar mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol zhing smra bar gyur to //
analyzed: spyan sngar mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol zhing smra bar gyur to //
translated: in his presence in front of him, he spoke and made this request.

original: khyab bdag ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: khyab bdag ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: The word Lord means the one who pervades.

original: bdag la sman pa zhes bya ba la bdag la phan pas na bdag la sman pa ste /
analyzed: bdag la sman pa zhes bya ba la bdag la phan pas na bdag la sman pa ste /
translated: The one who benefits me is the one who heals me.

original: 'tshang rgya ba de nyid thob pa'i don du bdag la phan pa'i phyir mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad du gsol zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i tshig thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //üîΩbdag gi don ni bdag nyid kyi don te /üîΩ'gro ba'i don bya ba de'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'tshang rgya ba de nyid thob pa'i don du bdag la phan pa'i phyir mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad du gsol zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i tshig thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o // bdag gi don ni bdag nyid kyi don te / 'gro ba'i don bya ba de'i don du'o //

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas gang mngon par byang chub pa de ci nas bdag gis thob par mdzad pa dang / de bzhin du sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas gang mngon par byang chub pa de ci nas bdag gis thob par mdzad pa dang / de bzhin du sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
translated: The request is: Please explain the Discourse of the Names of Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ for the attainment of the enlightenment that is manifested by the stages of mantra and seal of the Great Tantra of the Net of Illusion, and for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: ji lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi phyir zhe na /
translated: For what kind of sentient beings?

original: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing /
analyzed: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing /
translated: The request is: For those whose minds are disturbed by afflictions,

original: mi shes 'dam du bying pa yis //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mi shes 'dam du bying pa yis // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: and who are sunk in the mire of ignorance.

original: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste /
translated: Afflictions are desire and so forth.

original: de rnams kyis sems dkrugs pa dang mi shes pa'i ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis sems dkrugs pa dang mi shes pa'i ma rig pa'o //
translated: By those, the mind is disturbed. Ignorance is nescience.

original: de nyid 'dam ste der bying ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'dam ste der bying ba'o //
translated: That itself is a mire, and they are sunk in it.

original: de lta bu'i sems can rnams la sman pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / mi shes pa las bzlog pa'i @3b phyir te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems can rnams la sman pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / mi shes pa las bzlog pa'i @3b phyir te /
translated: For such sentient beings, for the benefit of reversing afflictions and ignorance.

original: nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa ldog par gyur na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa ldog par gyur na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the afflictions and ignorance are reversed, one attains the unsurpassed fruit.

original: de bas na de thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na de thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, for the sake of attaining that,

original: bla na med pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas pa nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas pa nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: for the sake of attaining the unsurpassed fruit of Buddhahood.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The perfect Buddha is as before.

original: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Endowed with perfect fortune, he is the Blessed One.

original: 'gro ba rnams la dam tshig ston pas na 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la dam tshig ston pas na 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
translated: Teaching the sacred commitments to beings, he is the Guru of beings.

original: sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rjes su ston pas na ston pa po'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rjes su ston pas na ston pa po'o //
translated: Teaching the three vehicles to sentient beings, he is the Teacher.

original: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sa ma ya zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dus la zer te /
analyzed: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sa ma ya zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dus la zer te /
translated: The term great sacred commitment is the term samaya, which means time.

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One knows the time.

original: de yang 'di'i tshe ni sems can blo yongs su smin pa rnams la chos ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: de yang 'di'i tshe ni sems can blo yongs su smin pa rnams la chos ston par mdzad do //
translated: Moreover, at this time, he teaches the Dharma to sentient beings whose minds are fully ripened.

original: 'di'i tshe na mi mdzad do zhes bya ba mkhyen te /
analyzed: 'di'i tshe na mi mdzad do zhes bya ba mkhyen te /
translated: He knows that he will not do this at this time.

original: de yang la lar bzhugs kyang mi gsungs ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang la lar bzhugs kyang mi gsungs ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And he knows that even though he is present in some places, he does not speak.

original: dbang po zhes bya ba la dbang po'i sgras ni mig la sogs pa gzung ste /
analyzed: dbang po zhes bya ba la dbang po'i sgras ni mig la sogs pa gzung ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúfaculty‚Äù refers to the eye, etc.

original: de yang sems can rnams kyi tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog mkhyen pas na dbang po mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: de yang sems can rnams kyi tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog mkhyen pas na dbang po mkhyen pa ste /
translated: And since he knows the inferior, middling, and superior faculties of sentient beings, he knows their faculties.

original: de yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni dbang po tha ma'i dbang du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni dbang po tha ma'i dbang du mdzad pa'o //
translated: The ≈örƒÅvaka Vehicle is for those of inferior faculties.

original: theg pa chen po ni dbang po 'bring gi dbang du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po ni dbang po 'bring gi dbang du mdzad pa'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle is for those of middling faculties.

original: gsang sngags kyi tshul ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du mdzad pa'o ;
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshul ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du mdzad pa'o ;
translated: The method of the mantra vehicle is for those of superior faculties.

original: / de yang dbang po rnon po'i dbang du gyur pas gsang sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags zhes gsungs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: / de yang dbang po rnon po'i dbang du gyur pas gsang sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags zhes gsungs zhes bya'o //
translated: And since it is for those of sharp faculties, it is said that the treatises of the mantra vehicle are superior.

original: de bzhin du bsam pa'i sgras ni sems la bya bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam pa'i sgras ni sems la bya bar shes par bya ste /
translated: In the same way, the word ‚Äúthought‚Äù should be understood to refer to the mind.

original: des kyang dbang po bzhin du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: des kyang dbang po bzhin du mdzad pa'o //
translated: He acts like a sense organ.

original: gsang sngags kyi tshul ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshul ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du mdzad pa ste /
translated: The way of mantra is for those of highest acumen.

original: des kyang dbang po bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sems mkhyen pas na mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: des kyang dbang po bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sems mkhyen pas na mkhyen pa'o //
translated: He knows the minds of sentient beings like a sense organ.

original: de nyid kyis na mchog ste gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mchog ste gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He is the best because he fulfills the wishes of others.

original: bcom ldan 'dis kyi zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'dis kyi zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is the speaker.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku yin pas na ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku yin pas na ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: He is a wisdom body because he is a body that is the nature of wisdom.

original: de'i gtsug tor yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na gtsug tor chen po ste de'i ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyi gtsug tu bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //

original: dngos po thams cad yongs su mkhyen pas na rang byung ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad yongs su mkhyen pas na rang byung ba'o //
translated: He is self-arisen because he fully knows all things.

original: 'jam dpal dbyangs dang ldan pas na 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal dbyangs dang ldan pas na 'jam dpal lo //
translated: He is Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ because he is endowed with Ma√±jugho·π£a.

original: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems dpa' yin pas na ye shes sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems dpa' yin pas na ye shes sems dpa' ste /
translated: The so-called wisdom being is a being whose nature is wisdom, and thus a wisdom being.

original: de'i sems dpa'i sgra ni sems yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i sems dpa'i sgra ni sems yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: The word sattva in that [term] should be understood as mind.

original: des na ye shes sems dpa' ste /üîΩde yang kye ma'o shin tu rab tu dang ba'i //
analyzed: des na ye shes sems dpa' ste / de yang kye ma'o shin tu rab tu dang ba'i //
translated: Therefore, a wisdom being.

original: sems dpa' 'di ni yongs su dag pa zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' 'di ni yongs su dag pa zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is explained as ‚Äúthis being of extremely pure faith.‚Äù

original: ye shes kyi sku dang ye shes sems dpa' gnyis kyi bye brag ni lus dang sems kyi rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku dang ye shes sems dpa' gnyis kyi bye brag ni lus dang sems kyi rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: The difference between the wisdom body and the wisdom being is the difference in the aspects of body and mind.

original: ye shes sems dpa' de'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' de'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the true explanation of the name of that wisdom being?

original: ming ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ming ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says ‚Äúname‚Äù and so on.

original: don zab ces bya ba la sogs pa la nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na don zab pa'o //
analyzed: don zab ces bya ba la sogs pa la nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na don zab pa'o //
translated: The profound meaning and so on: It is the profound meaning because it is not the domain of experience of the Sravakas and so on.

original: chos rnams kyi dngos po med pa ston pas na don ni rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi dngos po med pa ston pas na don ni rgya che ba'o //
translated: It is the vast meaning because it teaches the unreality of things.

original: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi don dang ldan pas na don che ba'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi don dang ldan pas na don che ba'o //
translated: It is the great meaning because it is endowed with the meaning of the way of mantra.

original: phyi rol gyi dpe dang bral bas na mtshungs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dpe dang bral bas na mtshungs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is the incomparable meaning because it is free from external examples.

original: sems can rnams kyis nges par legs pa'i lam thob par mdzad pas na rab tu zhi ba'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyis nges par legs pa'i lam thob par mdzad pas na rab tu zhi ba'o //
translated: It is the peaceful meaning because it causes sentient beings to attain the path of definite excellence.

original: thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i gnas skabs na thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge zhing thob par byed pas na thog ma bar dang mtha' mar dge ba'o //
analyzed: thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i gnas skabs na thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge zhing thob par byed pas na thog ma bar dang mtha' mar dge ba'o //
translated: It is the meaning that is virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end because it is virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end in the contexts of listening, reflection, and meditation, and because it causes attainment.

original: gzhan yang gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ba dang / de ltar byung ba'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gdul bya'i sems can rnams tshogs pa dang ma tshogs pa la ltos nas yang dang yang du gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ba dang / de ltar byung ba'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gdul bya'i sems can rnams tshogs pa dang ma tshogs pa la ltos nas yang dang yang du gsungs te /
translated: Moreover, the Bhagavat Buddhas of the past have taught it, the Buddhas of the future will teach it, and the Buddhas of the present also teach it again and again, in accordance with whether or not the sentient beings to be trained have gathered.

original: rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ni thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ni thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' ste /
translated: The venerable Manjusri is a Bodhisattva without beginning.

original: de dang 'brel pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang thog ma med pa'i gzhung lugs nyid do ;
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang thog ma med pa'i gzhung lugs nyid do ;
translated: This recitation of his true name, which is connected with him, is also a textual tradition without beginning.

original: / de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gdul bya rnams rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag nyid yang dang yang dran par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la zhus nas yang bshad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: / de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gdul bya rnams rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag nyid yang dang yang dran par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la zhus nas yang bshad pa yin gyi /
translated: Nevertheless, the Bhagavat Vajrapani, in order to take care of those to be trained and to remind himself again and again, asked the Bhagavat Shakyamuni and then explained it.

original: gzhan du ni //
analyzed: gzhan du ni //
translated: Otherwise,

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: The buddhas of the past have taught.

original: zhes bya ba ji ltar @4b rung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ji ltar @4b rung ste /
translated: How could this be so?

original: ma byung ba dag gsung ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: ma byung ba dag gsung ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: It is not reasonable that they would teach what has not arisen.

original: de bas na rgyud chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de bas na rgyud chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the text says ‚Äúthis great tantra‚Äù and so on.üîΩFrom this great tantra, the Web of Magical Display, the immeasurable and innumerable great Vajradharas, who hold the body of secret mantra, also sang songs of joy and offered praise.

original: rgyud chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'di las rdo rje 'chang chen po gsang sngags kyi lus 'dzin pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams kyang sems shin tu dga' bzhin pas glur blangs shing bstod pa gang lags pa de bshad cing bstan par gsol
analyzed: rgyud chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'di las rdo rje 'chang chen po gsang sngags kyi lus 'dzin pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams kyang sems shin tu dga' bzhin pas glur blangs shing bstod pa gang lags pa de bshad cing bstan par gsol
translated: Please explain and teach that.

original: te / bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba mtshan yang dag par brjod pa de bzung bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin par ci nas kyang bdag 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad par gsol te /
analyzed: te / bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba mtshan yang dag par brjod pa de bzung bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin par ci nas kyang bdag 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad par gsol te /
translated: Please explain so that I may also become a holder of the secret of all buddhas by upholding this explanation of the secret of all perfect buddhas, the Litany of the Names of Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin par gyur nas bdag gis kyang nges par byung bas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin par gyur nas bdag gis kyang nges par byung bas te /
translated: Having become a holder of the secret of all the buddhas, I too will definitely emerge,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di'i bdag nyid bsam pa brtan po brjed pa med pa'i sems su gyur pas gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di'i bdag nyid bsam pa brtan po brjed pa med pa'i sems su gyur pas gzung bar bgyi /
translated: and until nirvana, I will uphold this recitation of the true name of the TathƒÅgata with a firm intention and an undistracted mind.

original: de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi ste /
translated: Likewise, I will teach it to all sentient beings.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nyon mongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nyon mongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúAll afflictions,‚Äù and so on.

original: bdag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs ma lus par bsal zhing spang pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin du mi shes pa ste /
analyzed: bdag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs ma lus par bsal zhing spang pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin du mi shes pa ste /
translated: In order to completely remove and abandon all the afflictions of my own attachment, and likewise ignorance,

original: ma rig pa spang zhing dor ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi bsam pa tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog gi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bgyis nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad par 'tshal zhing bstan par 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa spang zhing dor ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi bsam pa tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog gi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bgyis nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad par 'tshal zhing bstan par 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
translated: In order to abandon and discard ignorance, having understood the differences in the ultimate, middling, and least aspirations of sentient beings, I request that you explain the recitation of the names, I request that you teach it.

original: gsang dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba byas nas thal mo spyar ba byas te /
analyzed: gsang dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba byas nas thal mo spyar ba byas te /
translated: With folded hands and so forth. Having thus requested the Tathagata and so forth, the Lord of Secrets Vajrapani joined his palms,

original: lus btud cing phab nas spyan sngar mdun du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: lus btud cing phab nas spyan sngar mdun du 'jug pa'o //
translated: bowed his body, and stood in front of them.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then means immediately after.

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gsang ba'i bdag po la slar gsungs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gsang ba'i bdag po la slar gsungs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The Bhagavat Shakyamuni spoke to the Lord of Secrets, Thus have I heard.

original: de yang dbang phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: de yang dbang phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: He is the Bhagavat because he possesses lordship and so forth.

original: sh'akya'i rigs su 'khrugs par ston pas na sh'akya'o //
analyzed: sh'akya'i rigs su 'khrugs par ston pas na sh'akya'o //
translated: He is a Shakya because he is the teacher who was born into the Shakya clan.

original: sku gsung thugs thub pas na thub pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs thub pas na thub pa'o //
translated: He is a Muni because he is the one who has conquered body, speech, and mind.

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i don thugs su chud pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i don thugs su chud pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: He is a perfect Buddha because he has realized the meaning that is without error.

original: lha dang mi'i mchog tu gyur pas na rkang gnyis mchog go //
analyzed: lha dang mi'i mchog tu gyur pas na rkang gnyis mchog go //
translated: He is the best of men because he has become the best of gods and men.

original: ci zhig mdzad nas slar yang gsungs she na /üîΩnyid kyi zhal nas zhes @5a * //
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad nas slar yang gsungs she na / nyid kyi zhal nas zhes @5a * //
translated: Why is it that he speaks again after having done something?

original: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says ‚Äúfrom his own mouth‚Äù and so on.

original: nyid kyi zhal nas nyid kyi ljags bsod nams kyi tshogs las byung bas na bzang ba dang / chur ring zhing rgyas par yangs pa brkyang zhing phyung nas 'dzum pa ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi zhal nas nyid kyi ljags bsod nams kyi tshogs las byung bas na bzang ba dang / chur ring zhing rgyas par yangs pa brkyang zhing phyung nas 'dzum pa ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: From his own mouth, from his own tongue, which has arisen from the accumulation of merit, he shows a smile, which is good, long, broad, and expansive.

original: ji lta bu'i 'dzum pa zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i 'dzum pa zhe na /
translated: What kind of smile?

original: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says ‚Äúthe world‚Äù and so on.

original: sa 'og sa stengs sa bla ni 'jig rten gsum ste /
analyzed: sa 'og sa stengs sa bla ni 'jig rten gsum ste /
translated: The three worlds are the underworld, the earth, and the heavens.

original: de la 'dzum pa las byung ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dzum pa las byung ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The light that arises from the smile illuminates and illuminates.

original: de bzhin du bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Similarly, it is called ‚Äúthe taming of the four demons, enemies.‚Äù

original: bdud bzhi ni lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdud bzhi ni lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa'o //
translated: The four demons are the demon of the son of gods, and so on.

original: de nyid dgra ste /
analyzed: de nyid dgra ste /
translated: They are demons because

original: 'phags pa'i lam gyi dbang po'i srog mthar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam gyi dbang po'i srog mthar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: they destroy the life of the faculties of the ƒÅrya path.

original: de rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni rang gi yul las spos te byang chub kyi lam la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni rang gi yul las spos te byang chub kyi lam la sbyor ba'o //
translated: The taming of them is the turning away from their own objects and the application to the path of enlightenment.

original: gzhan yang 'dzum pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dzum pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is that smile like?

original: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúthe purification of the three lower realms of sentient beings,‚Äù and so on.

original: dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gror skyes pa gyur pa'i ngan song gsum sbyong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gror skyes pa gyur pa'i ngan song gsum sbyong bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is the purification of the three lower realms of those born in the hells, hungry ghosts, and animals.

original: 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa 'dzum pa'i 'od kyis reg pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba spangs nas lha la sogs par skyes so //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa 'dzum pa'i 'od kyis reg pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba spangs nas lha la sogs par skyes so //
translated: The light of the smile touches the hell beings, and so on, and having abandoned the destinies of the hells, and so on, they are born as gods, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir ljags ring zhing yangs pa ston par mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ljags ring zhing yangs pa ston par mdzad ce na /
translated: Why does he display a long, broad tongue?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i skye ba bzhes par bstan pa gang yin pa de la ma yin no zhes 'jig rten pa dag som nyi rgyur pa de bzlog pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul ston pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i skye ba bzhes par bstan pa gang yin pa de la ma yin no zhes 'jig rten pa dag som nyi rgyur pa de bzlog pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul ston pa yin no //
translated: In order to dispel the doubts of worldly people, who think, ‚ÄúThat which the Lord has shown to be a human birth is not so!‚Äù he displays miracles and wonders.

original: ji ltar gsung gis gsang ba'i bdag po la slar gsungs she na /üîΩtshangs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar gsung gis gsang ba'i bdag po la slar gsungs she na / tshangs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: How does he speak to the Lord of Secrets?üîΩHe speaks to the Lord of Secrets with a Brahma voice,

original: tshangs pa'i gsung ni tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa la 'jug pas na 'jig rten gsum po 'gengs te /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gsung ni tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa la 'jug pas na 'jig rten gsum po 'gengs te /
translated: which is said to be the voice of Brahma, filling the three worlds,

original: ring po na gnas pa la'ang gom na gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ring po na gnas pa la'ang gom na gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: as if it were right in front of him, even if he is far away.

original: de lta bu'i gsung shin tu snyan pas gsang ba'i bdag po la slar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i gsung shin tu snyan pas gsang ba'i bdag po la slar gsungs pa'o //
translated: He speaks to the Lord of Secrets with such a pleasant voice.

original: lag na rdo rje yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is Vajrapani like?

original: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
translated: He is Vajrapani, the Great Powerful One,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: stobs po che zhes bya ba ni khams gsum las rnam par rgyal bas so //
analyzed: stobs po che zhes bya ba ni khams gsum las rnam par rgyal bas so //
translated: The great strength is because of the victory over the three realms.

original: gang gi don du zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi don du zhe na /
translated: For whose sake?

original: 'gro la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'gro la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says for the sake of the world, etc.

original: sems can rnams la rjes su brtse ba dang ldan @5b pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams la rjes su brtse ba dang ldan @5b pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the great compassion that is full of love for sentient beings, for the sake of the world is for the benefit of beings.

original: gang gi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yin zhe na /
translated: Whose name is to be recited?

original: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi //
analyzed: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi //
translated: The body of wisdom, Manjusri,

original: zhes gsungs pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: is to be connected with the verse.

original: ji lta bu'i mtshan yang dag par brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i mtshan yang dag par brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: What kind of name is to be recited?

original: ming brjod pas ni don che ba //
analyzed: ming brjod pas ni don che ba //
translated: He says the great meaning, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs ba sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas na don che ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs ba sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas na don che ba'o //
translated: The great meaning is because it is the cause for attaining Buddhahood.

original: bklags pa tsam gyis rgyud gtsang bar byed pas na dag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bklags pa tsam gyis rgyud gtsang bar byed pas na dag par byed pa'o //
translated: The purifier is because it purifies the mindstream merely by being recited.

original: sdig pa rnams 'jig par byed pas na sdig pa sel ba ste /
analyzed: sdig pa rnams 'jig par byed pas na sdig pa sel ba ste /
translated: The destroyer of evil is because it destroys evil deeds.üîΩ The bestower of the fruit of the highest goal is because it bestows the fruit of the highest goal, Buddhahood.

original: de lta bu'i don che ba'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur pas ra las nyan par brtson zhing thos par bya bar nges par gnas pa ni legs so zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i don che ba'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur pas ra las nyan par brtson zhing thos par bya bar nges par gnas pa ni legs so zhes so //
translated: Thus, the one who is endowed with great compassion, the one who is called the one who recites the true meaning, is the one who is intent on listening, and is certainly established in the act of hearing.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
translated: The one who is called the glorious Vajradhara is the one who is addressed.

original: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
translated: VajrapƒÅ·πái, it is excellent!

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba la mkhas pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba la mkhas pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'o //
translated: This is the bestowal of the word excellent in order to teach the greatness of being skilled in asking questions.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: The one who is called the lord of secrets is the one who is addressed.

original: de ltar bdag gis khyed la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bstan par bya yis khyod kyis gzhan du ma yengs shing rje gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis khyed la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bstan par bya yis khyod kyis gzhan du ma yengs shing rje gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig ces pa'o //
translated: Thus, having bestowed the word excellent upon you, I will teach the recitation of the true meaning. Listen with a one-pointed mind, without distraction elsewhere!

original: de ni legs zhes gsol zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa de ni legs so legs par 'di mnyan par bgyi'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de ni legs zhes gsol zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa de ni legs so legs par 'di mnyan par bgyi'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: That is excellent means the BhagavƒÅn's statement, 'Listen with a one-pointed mind,' is excellent. I will listen to this.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma theg pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma theg pa'o //
translated: Then means immediately after that.

original: sh'akya'i rigs las byung bas na sh'akya'o //
analyzed: sh'akya'i rigs las byung bas na sh'akya'o //
translated: Since he arose from the ≈öƒÅkya family, he is ≈öƒÅkya.

original: sku gsung thugs thub pas na thub pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs thub pas na thub pa'o //
translated: Since he is the sage of body, speech, and mind, he is the Sage.

original: gsang sngags rigs chen ni sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi rigs te /
analyzed: gsang sngags rigs chen ni sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi rigs te /
translated: The great family of secret mantra is the family of tantras such as the Great Illusion,

original: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rtog pa thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rtog pa thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for generating all activities, conduct, and concepts.

original: thams cad ni ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ni ma lus pa'o //
translated: All means without exception.

original: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
analyzed: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
translated: The family of mantra-dhara vidyƒÅdharas

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs de la gcig tu gzhol ba'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs de la gcig tu gzhol ba'i rigs so //
translated: means that family is the family of those devoted to that.

original: rigs gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / padma'i rigs so //
analyzed: rigs gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / padma'i rigs so //
translated: The three families are the TathƒÅgata family, the Vajra family, and the Padma family.üîΩ

original: 'jig rten ba'i rigs ni tha mal ba'i dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i sems can gyi rigs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten ba'i rigs ni tha mal ba'i dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i sems can gyi rigs so //
translated: The mundane family is the family of beings such as the ordinary upasaka.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs so //üîΩde nyid @6a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs so // de nyid @6a * //
translated: The supramundane family is the family of the sravaka, pratyekabuddha, and bodhisattva.

original: kyis ni 'jig rten rnams kyi ye shes kyi snang ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kyis ni 'jig rten rnams kyi ye shes kyi snang ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By that, he is the illuminator of the world's wisdom.

original: de dang mchog tu gyur pas na chen po'o //
analyzed: de dang mchog tu gyur pas na chen po'o //
translated: Since it is the best, it is great.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs ni lha mo'i rigs te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs ni lha mo'i rigs te /
translated: The family of the great seal is the family of the goddesses.

original: de nyid kyis na gtso bor gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gtso bor gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: Since it is the best, it is supreme.

original: rigs chen gtsug tor gyi rigs ni gtsug tor yi ge gcig pa la sogs pa'i rigs te /
analyzed: rigs chen gtsug tor gyi rigs ni gtsug tor yi ge gcig pa la sogs pa'i rigs te /
translated: The family of the great ushnisha is the family of the one-syllable ushnisha and so forth.

original: rigs de dag skal ba dang ldan pa dang / skal ba med pa dang snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rigs de dag skal ba dang ldan pa dang / skal ba med pa dang snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa ste /
translated: Those families are endowed with good fortune, without good fortune, vessels, and not vessels.

original: de dag gi ngo bo nyid brtags pas gzigs nas tshig gi bdag po dang 'brel pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag gi ngo bo nyid brtags pas gzigs nas tshig gi bdag po dang 'brel pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Having seen their nature by investigating them, he spoke these verses connected with the Lord of Words.

original: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
translated: Endowed with the six kings of mantra,

original: zhes bya ba ni aom badzra t'ikshna zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po drug po de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aom badzra t'ikshna zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po drug po de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: means endowed with those six kings of mantra beginning with O·πÉ vajra-tƒ´k·π£·πáa.üîΩArising non-dually

original: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
translated: means teaching the non-duality of apprehended object and apprehending subject.üîΩHaving the nature of the non-arisen

original: mi skye ba'i chos can zhes bya ba ni gang mi skye ba'i chos ston pa de ni 'dir mi skye ba'i chos can te des gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos can zhes bya ba ni gang mi skye ba'i chos ston pa de ni 'dir mi skye ba'i chos can te des gsungs pa'o //
translated: means that which teaches the non-arisen is here the one having the nature of the non-arisen, and that is what is spoken.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: aa a'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: aa a'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says A ƒÄ, and so on.

original: nga ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid kyi ye shes kyi sku ste /
analyzed: nga ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid kyi ye shes kyi sku ste /
translated: I am the gnosis body of those very Blessed Buddhas dwelling in the three times.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi thugs la gnas pas na bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes pa'o //üîΩaom badzra t'ikshna zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ming gi gtso bo rnams kyis bstod nas mtshan bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi thugs la gnas pas na bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes pa'o // aom badzra t'ikshna zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ming gi gtso bo rnams kyis bstod nas mtshan bshad par bya'o //
translated: Since it abides in the mind of the nature of the ultimate realm, it is I am the Buddha.

original: zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Om Vajra Tiskha and so forth are the principal names by which he is praised, and the epithets are to be explained.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus indicates the occasion.

original: blo mchog tu gyur pas na sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: blo mchog tu gyur pas na sangs rgyas so //
translated: Since he is the best of minds, he is the Buddha.

original: bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Since he has conquered the four demons, he is the Bhagavat.

original: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: Since he has fully awakened to all phenomena, he is the Perfect Buddha.

original: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams 'byung bas na aa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams 'byung bas na aa las byung ba'o //
translated: Since the letters such as a arise, he is arisen from a.

original: yi ge dpag tu med pa yod kyang ci'i phyir aa nyid las byung zhe na /
analyzed: yi ge dpag tu med pa yod kyang ci'i phyir aa nyid las byung zhe na /
translated: Why is it that, although there are innumerable letters, he is arisen from a?

original: aa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: aa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said a is the best of all letters.

original: aa ni yig 'dru kun gyi mchog tu gyur pas de nyid las byung ba'o //
analyzed: aa ni yig 'dru kun gyi mchog tu gyur pas de nyid las byung ba'o //
translated: Since it is the best of all letters, he is arisen from a.

original: don chen po sangs rgyas la sogs pa yin pas don chen no //
analyzed: don chen po sangs rgyas la sogs pa yin pas don chen no //
translated: It is of great import, since it is the cause of Buddhahood, etc.

original: mchog tu gyur pas na yi ge dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pas na yi ge dam pa'o //
translated: It is the best of syllables, since it is the best.

original: nam mkha' dang rlung las 'byung bas na khong nas 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang rlung las 'byung bas na khong nas 'byung ba'o //
translated: It is the inner one, since it arises from space and wind.

original: aa ni chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa'i sgo yin pas na @6b skye ba med pa'o //
analyzed: aa ni chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa'i sgo yin pas na @6b skye ba med pa'o //
translated: A is the door to the non-arising of all dharmas, hence it is non-arising.

original: skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa'o //üîΩbrjod pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur cing sgra'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin pas na brjod pa kun gyi rgyu'i mchog go //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa'o // brjod pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur cing sgra'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin pas na brjod pa kun gyi rgyu'i mchog go //
translated: Since it is the nature of non-arising, it is free from verbal expression.üîΩIt is the best cause of all expressions, since it is the principal cause of sound.

original: tshig thams cad kyi rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pas tshig kun no //
analyzed: tshig thams cad kyi rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pas tshig kun no //
translated: It is all words, since it is the cause of the occurrence of all words.

original: sngags kyi bdag nyid kyi 'od shin tu bzang po dang ldan pas na rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi bdag nyid kyi 'od shin tu bzang po dang ldan pas na rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is the illuminator, since it possesses the light of the nature of mantra, which is very good.

original: mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: It is the great offering, etc.

original: mchod pa chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa chen po ste /
analyzed: mchod pa chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa chen po ste /
translated: That which possesses the great offering is the great offering.

original: mchod pa chen po zhes pa'i sgra thams cad la yang don 'di bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po zhes pa'i sgra thams cad la yang don 'di bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that this meaning is also in all the terms such as ‚Äúgreat worship.‚Äù

original: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos nyan pa la sogs pa'i dga' ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na 'dod chags chen po'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can rnams la dam pa'i chos nyan pa la sogs pa'i dga' ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na 'dod chags chen po'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúgreat passion‚Äù because it is the cause of generating the joy of listening to the holy Dharma and so on in sentient beings, by possessing great compassion.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi dgra chen po thams cad la sdang ba'i dgra gyur pas na zhes sdang chen po'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi dgra chen po thams cad la sdang ba'i dgra gyur pas na zhes sdang chen po'o //
translated: It is ‚Äúgreat hatred‚Äù because it is the enemy of all the great enemies of the afflictions.

original: mi shes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i blo gang yin pa de ni gti mug blo ste /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i blo gang yin pa de ni gti mug blo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúGreat delusion‚Äù is the mind that is covered by the darkness of ignorance.

original: sems can gyi rgyud la gnas pa'i gti mug rtsad nas 'byin pa'i rgyur gyur pas na gti mug chen po ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi rgyud la gnas pa'i gti mug rtsad nas 'byin pa'i rgyur gyur pas na gti mug chen po ste /
translated: It is ‚Äúgreat delusion‚Äù because it is the cause of eradicating the delusion that resides in the continuum of sentient beings.

original: ji ltar rims sel ba'i sngags la rims kyi sngags zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rims sel ba'i sngags la rims kyi sngags zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the mantra that cures a fever being called the ‚Äúfever mantra.‚Äù

original: bdud la sogs pa khro ba chen po skyes pa rnams la bzod pa'i mtshon chas de rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pas na khro ba chen po'o //
analyzed: bdud la sogs pa khro ba chen po skyes pa rnams la bzod pa'i mtshon chas de rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pas na khro ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the great wrathful one, because he is the weapon of patience that destroys the great wrath of Mara and others.

original: de nyid kyis na khro ba'i dgrar gyur pas khro ba chen po'i dgra chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na khro ba'i dgrar gyur pas khro ba chen po'i dgra chen po'o //
translated: He is the great enemy of the great wrathful one, because he is the enemy of wrath.

original: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa las byung ba'i chags pa thams cad sel ba'i rgyur gyur pas na chags pa chen po'o //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa las byung ba'i chags pa thams cad sel ba'i rgyur gyur pas na chags pa chen po'o //
translated: He is the great attachment, because he is the cause of removing all attachments that arise from the manifest clinging to I and mine.

original: sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid kyi che ba la rab tu 'jog par bzhed pa'i 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni 'dod pa chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid kyi che ba la rab tu 'jog par bzhed pa'i 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni 'dod pa chen po'o //
translated: He is the great desire, because he has the desire to establish all sentient beings in the greatness of Buddhahood.

original: sems can rnams la thar pa'i bde ba stsol bas na bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la thar pa'i bde ba stsol bas na bde ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the great bliss, because he bestows the bliss of liberation on sentient beings.

original: zab mo'i chos ston pa'i sgo nas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba chen po'o //
analyzed: zab mo'i chos ston pa'i sgo nas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the great joy, because he is the great joy of sentient beings through teaching the profound Dharma.

original: cho 'phrul rnams bstan pas gdul bya rnams kyi yid mgu ba bskyed pas na mgu ba chen po'o //
analyzed: cho 'phrul rnams bstan pas gdul bya rnams kyi yid mgu ba bskyed pas na mgu ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the great satisfaction, because he generates satisfaction in disciples through displaying miracles.

original: khong khro ba med pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba ma lus pa tshim par byed pas na gzugs chen po'o //
analyzed: khong khro ba med pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba ma lus pa tshim par byed pas na gzugs chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Body, since he satisfies all beings without exception by the method of non-anger.

original: mi'i lus las 'das par gyur pas na lus che ba'o //üîΩsna tshogs pa'i gzugs @7a * //
analyzed: mi'i lus las 'das par gyur pas na lus che ba'o // sna tshogs pa'i gzugs @7a * //
translated: He is the Great Form, since he has gone beyond the human body.

original: dang kha dog ston pas na kha dog chen po'o //
analyzed: dang kha dog ston pas na kha dog chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Color, since he displays various forms and colors.

original: gzi mdangs dang ldan pas na lus bong che'o //
analyzed: gzi mdangs dang ldan pas na lus bong che'o //
translated: He is the Great Stature, since he is resplendent.

original: mchog tu gyur pa'i mtshan mnga' bas na ming yang che'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa'i mtshan mnga' bas na ming yang che'o //
translated: He is the Great Name, since he possesses the supreme marks.

original: chos dang zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa rab tu stsol bas rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: chos dang zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa rab tu stsol bas rgya che ba'o //
translated: He is the Great Expanse, since he bestows the Dharma, material gifts, and fearlessness.

original: lha dang lha mo rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor pa'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa mnga' bas na dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang lha mo rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor pa'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa mnga' bas na dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa'o //
translated: He is the Great Expansive Circle, since he possesses a circle of attendants consisting of gods and goddesses.

original: mu stegs can rnams kyi shes rab gcod pa'i don gyis na shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: mu stegs can rnams kyi shes rab gcod pa'i don gyis na shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the Great Sword of Wisdom, since he cuts through the wisdom of the tƒ´rthikas.

original: nyon mongs pa'i glang po 'dul bas na nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i glang po 'dul bas na nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'o //
translated: He is the Great Hook of Afflictions, since he tames the elephant of afflictions.

original: mchog ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: mchog ni gtso bo ste /
translated: The supreme is the principal one.

original: gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa'i glang po che bzlog dka' ba 'dren pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa'i glang po che bzlog dka' ba 'dren pas so //
translated: He is the great elephant because he is the leader of the difficult to subdue elephant of the afflictions.

original: grags pa khams gsum du sgrogs pas na grags chen no //
analyzed: grags pa khams gsum du sgrogs pas na grags chen no //
translated: He is the great fame because he proclaims the fame in the three worlds.

original: sems can gyi bya ba la spyod pa na bdag gi thams cad gtong bas na snyan grags chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi bya ba la spyod pa na bdag gi thams cad gtong bas na snyan grags chen po'o //
translated: He is the great fame because he is the one who gives up everything when he engages in the activities of sentient beings.

original: nang gi ye shes kyi snang ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na snang ba che'o //
analyzed: nang gi ye shes kyi snang ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na snang ba che'o //
translated: He is the great light because he is the essence of the inner light of wisdom.

original: phyi rol du 'byung ba'i 'od zer gyis yongs su bskor bas na gsal ba che'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du 'byung ba'i 'od zer gyis yongs su bskor bas na gsal ba che'o //
translated: He is the great clarity because he is surrounded by the light rays that arise externally.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i ngo bo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don gzugs brnyan bzhin du sems la 'chang bas na sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i ngo bo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don gzugs brnyan bzhin du sems la 'chang bas na sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the wielder of the great illusion because he holds the meaning of dependent origination, which is the essence of the great illusion, in his mind like a reflection.

original: 'di nyid kyi don gyi snod du gyur pas na mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi don gyi snod du gyur pas na mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is the wise one because he is a vessel for the meaning of this.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don sems can rnams la sgrub cing gsal bar mdzad pas na sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa'o /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don sems can rnams la sgrub cing gsal bar mdzad pas na sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa'o /
translated: He is the one who accomplishes the meaning of the great illusion because he establishes and clarifies the meaning of the great illusion for sentient beings.

original: gang sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don gyi ngo bo nyid du grub pa la dga' ba de rnams kyis 'dzin pa de bzlog pa la dgyes pas na sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'o //üîΩso so'i skye bo gang zhig sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don bshad pa yang dag par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de rnams la mig 'phrul ltar sprul pa rnams sprul te bstan pas dngos por 'dzin pa las bzlog pas na sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can no //
analyzed: gang sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don gyi ngo bo nyid du grub pa la dga' ba de rnams kyis 'dzin pa de bzlog pa la dgyes pas na sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'o // so so'i skye bo gang zhig sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don bshad pa yang dag par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de rnams la mig 'phrul ltar sprul pa rnams sprul te bstan pas dngos por 'dzin pa las bzlog pas na sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can no //
translated: He is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.

original: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa mdzad pas na sbyin bdag chen po ste /üîΩde nyid kyis na gtso bo ste mchog go //
analyzed: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa mdzad pas na sbyin bdag chen po ste / de nyid kyis na gtso bo ste mchog go //
translated: He is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.

original: srog gcod pa la sogs pa spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshul khrims mnga' bas na tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'o //üîΩtshul khrims 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog yin pas na mchog go //
analyzed: srog gcod pa la sogs pa spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshul khrims mnga' bas na tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'o //üîΩtshul khrims 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog yin pas na mchog go //
translated: He is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.üîΩHe is the Great Illusionist, because he delights in the reversal of the grasping of those who delight in the establishment of the essence of the Great Illusion.

original: sems can @7b thams cad kyi gnod pa dang khro ba bzod pa dang ldan pas bzod chen 'chang ba bstan pa po'o //
analyzed: sems can @7b thams cad kyi gnod pa dang khro ba bzod pa dang ldan pas bzod chen 'chang ba bstan pa po'o //
translated: He is the teacher of the great patience, because he is endowed with the patience to bear the harm and anger of all sentient beings.üîΩHe is the one with great effort,

original: bdud kyi zil gyis mi non pas //üîΩbrtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //üîΩzhes bya ste /
analyzed: bdud kyi zil gyis mi non pas // brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin // zhes bya ste /
translated: because he is not overcome by Mara.

original: pha rol gnon pa byas pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol gnon pa byas pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has done the practice,

original: 'khor lo drug bsgom pa'i bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas pas na bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas so //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug bsgom pa'i bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas pas na bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas so //
translated: because he has the great meditative stabilization of the cultivation of the six wheels.üîΩHe is the one with the body of great wisdom,

original: shes rab chen po'i lus gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dzin pas na shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab chen po'i lus gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dzin pas na shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba'o //
translated: because he holds the nondual wisdom.üîΩHe is the great strength,

original: bdud rnams zil gyis gnon pas na stobs po che'o //
analyzed: bdud rnams zil gyis gnon pas na stobs po che'o //
translated: because he overcomes the Maras.üîΩHe is the great method,

original: sbyin pa chen pos sems can rnams 'dul bas na thabs che ba'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa chen pos sems can rnams 'dul bas na thabs che ba'o //
translated: because he tames sentient beings with great generosity.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i sngon gyi smon lam rdzogs par mdzad pas na smon lam mo //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i sngon gyi smon lam rdzogs par mdzad pas na smon lam mo //
translated: The vow is the vow to lead all sentient beings to nirvana in the expanse of nirvana without remainder.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi don bsags pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas na ye shes rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi don bsags pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pas na ye shes rgya mtsho'o //
translated: The ocean of intuition is the intuition that accumulates the meaning of all things and is the source of the jewel of nonconceptual intuition.

original: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par du 'phags pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par du 'phags pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the superiority by way of the nature of the ten perfections,

original: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis khyad par du 'phags pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis khyad par du 'phags pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the superiority by way of the four pure abodes,

original: byams chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: byams chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: he says, great love, and so on.

original: zhe sdang gi gnyen por gyur pa ni byams pa chen po'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi gnyen por gyur pa ni byams pa chen po'o //
translated: Great love is the antidote to hatred.

original: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of great love is the nature of that.

original: tshad med pas na dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pas na dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Immeasurable means infinite.

original: thugs rje chen po'i rgyud dang ldan pas na snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i rgyud dang ldan pas na snying rje chen po'o //
translated: It is great compassion because it possesses the tantra of great compassion.

original: mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab mnga' bas na blo'i mchog go //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab mnga' bas na blo'i mchog go //
translated: It is the best of minds because it possesses the best wisdom.

original: dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab chen pos sems can thams cad la chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i dga' ba bskyed pas na shes rab chen po'o //
analyzed: dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab chen pos sems can thams cad la chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i dga' ba bskyed pas na shes rab chen po'o //
translated: It is great wisdom because it generates the joy of all sentient beings through the great wisdom that is the nature of joy, and it is the joy of understanding all phenomena.

original: blo gros chen po dang ldan pas na blo chen ldan no //
analyzed: blo gros chen po dang ldan pas na blo chen ldan no //
translated: It is endowed with great intelligence because it possesses great intelligence.

original: btang snyoms kyi ngo bo nyid ni /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi ngo bo nyid ni /
translated: The nature of equanimity is

original: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba // zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: greatly skilled, with great means.

original: sems can chen po'i don mdzad pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na mkhas pa chen po'o //
analyzed: sems can chen po'i don mdzad pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na mkhas pa chen po'o //
translated: It is greatly skilled because it accomplishes the benefit of great sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa chen po la btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid can gyi thabs mnga' bas na thabs che ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa chen po la btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid can gyi thabs mnga' bas na thabs che ba'o //
translated: It is endowed with great means because it possesses the means that is characterized by equanimity toward great afflictions.

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin las bdud rnams kyis g-yo bar mi nus pas @8a * //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin las bdud rnams kyis g-yo bar mi nus pas @8a * //
translated: It is the power of great miracles because it is the concentration that cannot be moved by demons.

original: na rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs chen ldan no //
analyzed: na rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs chen ldan no //
translated: He has the great power of great miracles.

original: ma g-yos kyang thams cad du bdag nyid kyi dngos po ston pas na shugs chen po'o //
analyzed: ma g-yos kyang thams cad du bdag nyid kyi dngos po ston pas na shugs chen po'o //
translated: He has great momentum, because he displays his own body everywhere without moving.

original: yid kyis 'gro ba'i shugs dang ldan pas na mgyogs pa chen po'o //
analyzed: yid kyis 'gro ba'i shugs dang ldan pas na mgyogs pa chen po'o //
translated: He has great speed, because he has the speed of thought.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
translated: He has great miracles, because he has the great magical power of miracles.

original: thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na cher grags pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na cher grags pa'o //
translated: He is greatly renowned, because he is the foremost of all.

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas gzhan gyi don du 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gnod pas na stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas gzhan gyi don du 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gnod pas na stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po'o //
translated: He is the great powerful conqueror, because he benefits others by means of his great power in innumerable world-realms.

original: skye ba chen po'i srid pa'i ri bo yang dag par 'joms pas na srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms pa'o ;
analyzed: skye ba chen po'i srid pa'i ri bo yang dag par 'joms pas na srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms pa'o ;
translated: He is the conqueror of the great mountain of existence, because he truly conquers even the great mountain of existence, the great birth.

original: / glags skabs tshol ba'i bdud rnams kyis glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir mkhregs pa'o //
analyzed: / glags skabs tshol ba'i bdud rnams kyis glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir mkhregs pa'o //
translated: He is firm, because the demons who seek an opportunity do not find one.
