translated: Since it is the teacher who, in order to protect the teaching from destruction, teaches the virtues of the Three Jewels as a preliminary, and causes beings to take up the Buddha, Dharma, and Sa·πÖgha, it is the upholder of the Three Jewels.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ni theg pa gsum mo //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ni theg pa gsum mo //
translated: The three vehicles are the vehicle of the disciples, the vehicle of the solitary sages, and the vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

original: de rnams ni phyi rol gyi tshul las dam pa yin pas na mchog ste /
analyzed: de rnams ni phyi rol gyi tshul las dam pa yin pas na mchog ste /
translated: Since these are the highest among the external systems, they are supreme.

original: de rnams bsam pa rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i sems can rnams la ston par mdzad pas na theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po'o //
analyzed: de rnams bsam pa rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i sems can rnams la ston par mdzad pas na theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po'o //
translated: Since it is the teacher who teaches these to beings of highest, middling, and lowest aspiration, it is the teacher of the three supreme vehicles.

original: don yod cing 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i thugs rje chen po'i zhags pas sems can rnams bcings nas lam bzang po la bkod pas na don yod zhags pa'o //
analyzed: don yod cing 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i thugs rje chen po'i zhags pas sems can rnams bcings nas lam bzang po la bkod pas na don yod zhags pa'o //
translated: Since it is the one who, with the unfailing, fruitful noose of great compassion, binds beings and establishes them on the good path, it is the unfailing noose.

original: bdud dang mu stegs rnams las rnam par rgyal ba mnga' bas na rnam par rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: bdud dang mu stegs rnams las rnam par rgyal ba mnga' bas na rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: He is called Victorious because he is victorious over demons and non-Buddhists.

original: phyi rol gyi don la mngon par zhen pa'i 'dzin pa chen po nges par bzlog pas na 'dzin pa chen po'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la mngon par zhen pa'i 'dzin pa chen po nges par bzlog pas na 'dzin pa chen po'o //
translated: He is called Great Seizer because he definitely stops the great grasping that clings to external objects.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i zhags pa bsnams pas na rdo rje zhags pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i zhags pa bsnams pas na rdo rje zhags pa'o //
translated: He is called Vajra-noose because he holds a noose marked with a vajra.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags kyu bsnams pas na rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags kyu bsnams pas na rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
translated: He is called Vajra-hook because he holds a hook marked with a vajra.

original: zhags pa chen pos sems can gdug pa can rnams bcings nas yang dag pa'i lam la 'god pas na zhags pa chen po'o //
analyzed: zhags pa chen pos sems can gdug pa can rnams bcings nas yang dag pa'i lam la 'god pas na zhags pa chen po'o //
translated: He is called Great Noose because he binds wicked sentient beings with a great noose and establishes them on the true path.

original: rdo rje 'jigs byed ni gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jigs byed ni gshin rje gshed do //
translated: Vajra-Bhairava is Yamantaka.

original: de'i gzugs la gnas nas sems can ma rungs pa rnams la 'jigs pa bskyed par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed do //
analyzed: de'i gzugs la gnas nas sems can ma rungs pa rnams la 'jigs pa bskyed par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed do //
translated: He is called Vajra-Bhairava-Bhairava because he abides in that form and generates fear in wicked sentient beings.

original: khro bo'i gtso bor gyur pas na khro bo'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i gtso bor gyur pas na khro bo'i rgyal po'o //
translated: He is called King of Wrathful Ones because he is the chief of wrathful ones.

original: gdong drug gang la yod pa de ni gdong drug go //
analyzed: gdong drug gang la yod pa de ni gdong drug go //
translated: He who has six faces is called Six-Faced.

original: skrag par byed pas na 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: skrag par byed pas na 'jigs pa'o //
translated: It is terrifying because it terrifies.

original: mig @14b drug gang la yod pa de ni mig drug go //
analyzed: mig @14b drug gang la yod pa de ni mig drug go //
translated: He who has six eyes is Six-eyed.

original: rjes su dran pa drug gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyag drug gang yin pa de ni lag drug ces bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa drug gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyag drug gang yin pa de ni lag drug ces bya'o //
translated: He who has six arms that are the nature of the six recollections is Six-armed.

original: sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan pas na stobs dang ldan no //
analyzed: sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan pas na stobs dang ldan no //
translated: He who possesses the strength of Narayana is Strong.

original: keng rus rnams kyis brgyan pas keng rus so //
analyzed: keng rus rnams kyis brgyan pas keng rus so //
translated: He who is adorned with skeletons is Skeleton.

original: rno zhing 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pas na mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
analyzed: rno zhing 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pas na mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
translated: He who bares his sharp and fearsome fangs is Fanged.

original: ha la ha la'i dug dang ldan pa'i sprul brgya snyed kyis yan lag thams cad brgyan pas na ha la ha la gdong brgya pa'o //
analyzed: ha la ha la'i dug dang ldan pa'i sprul brgya snyed kyis yan lag thams cad brgyan pas na ha la ha la gdong brgya pa'o //
translated: He who is adorned with all limbs by a hundred emanations possessing the poison of Hala-hala is Hala-hala-faced.

original: gshin rje mthar byas nas lam bzang po la 'jog pas gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byas nas lam bzang po la 'jog pas gshin rje gshed do //
translated: He who, having destroyed Yama, establishes him on the good path is Yamantaka.

original: bgegs thams cad kyi mnga' bdag yin pas na bgegs kyi rgyal lo //
analyzed: bgegs thams cad kyi mnga' bdag yin pas na bgegs kyi rgyal lo //
translated: He who is the lord of all obstacles is Obstacles King.

original: thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang ldan pas na rdo rje shugs can no //
analyzed: thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang ldan pas na rdo rje shugs can no //
translated: He who possesses unobstructed movement is Vajra Speed.

original: gdug pa can rnams skrag par mdzad pas na 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa can rnams skrag par mdzad pas na 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: He is the one who terrifies the wicked, because he terrifies the wicked.

original: mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: He is the vajra, because he is indivisible.

original: shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngo bor 'jig rten gsum du grags pas na grags pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngo bor 'jig rten gsum du grags pas na grags pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is famous, because he is famous in the three worlds as having a very frightening form.

original: snying ga'i phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin pas na rdo rje snying ngo //
analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin pas na rdo rje snying ngo //
translated: He is the vajra heart, because he holds the vajra in his heart.

original: sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs ston pas na sgyu 'phrul rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs ston pas na sgyu 'phrul rdo rje'o //
translated: He is the vajra illusion, because he displays various illusions.

original: gsus pa chen po mnga' bas na gsus po che'o //
analyzed: gsus pa chen po mnga' bas na gsus po che'o //
translated: He is the great belly, because he has a great belly.

original: mi phyed pa'i chos kyi skye gnas las byung bas na rdo rje las skyes pa'o //üîΩrdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na rdo rje'i bdag go //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i chos kyi skye gnas las byung bas na rdo rje las skyes pa'o // rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na rdo rje'i bdag go //
translated: He is the vajra-born, because he arises from the womb of the indivisible Dharma.üîΩHe is the vajra self, because he is the lord of the vajra family.

original: rdo rje snying po'i sku mnga' bas na rdo rje snying po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po'i sku mnga' bas na rdo rje snying po'o //
translated: He is the vajra essence, because he has a body of vajra essence.

original: sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pas na nam mkha' 'dra'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pas na nam mkha' 'dra'o //
translated: He is like space, because he opens up space for all sentient beings.

original: rang gi shes rab las mi bskyod pas na mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi shes rab las mi bskyod pas na mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: He is the immovable, because he is unshakable from his own wisdom.

original: rgya che ba'i ral pa'i tshogs mnga' bas na ral pa gcig gis bsgyings pa'o //
analyzed: rgya che ba'i ral pa'i tshogs mnga' bas na ral pa gcig gis bsgyings pa'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe one who is majestic with a single lock of hair‚Äù because he has a large mass of hair.

original: glang po che'i pags pas gos su mdzad pas na glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon no //
analyzed: glang po che'i pags pas gos su mdzad pas na glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon no //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe one who wears an elephant hide‚Äù because he wears an elephant skin.

original: 'jigs pa'i gzugs ston pas na drag chen no //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i gzugs ston pas na drag chen no //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe great fierce one‚Äù because he displays a terrifying form.

original: h'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags 'don pas na h'a h'a zhes sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: h'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags 'don pas na h'a h'a zhes sgrogs pa'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe one who proclaims ‚Äòha ha‚Äô‚Äù because he utters the mantra ‚Äúha ha.‚Äù

original: hi hi zhes pas 'jigs pa bskyed pas na hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: hi hi zhes pas 'jigs pa bskyed pas na hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe one who proclaims ‚Äòhi hi‚Äô and causes fear‚Äù because he causes fear with ‚Äúhi hi.‚Äù

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa khyab pas na gad mo chen po'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa khyab pas na gad mo chen po'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe great laugher‚Äù because he pervades all the world systems.

original: rdo rje h'a h'a zhes bzhad pa sgrogs pas na gad rgyangs can no //
analyzed: rdo rje h'a h'a zhes bzhad pa sgrogs pas na gad rgyangs can no //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe one who laughs with a vajra ‚Äòha ha‚Äô‚Äù because he proclaims a vajra ‚Äúha ha.‚Äù

original: gzhan rnams kyis mi phyed pas ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi sgra chen po mnga' bas na cher sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis mi phyed pas ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi sgra chen po mnga' bas na cher sgrogs pa'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúthe great proclamation‚Äù because he has a great sound that is the nature of wisdom, which is indivisible from others.

original: rdo rje dang 'dra ba mi phyed pa'i thugs mnga' bas na rdo rje sems dpa'o //üîΩsems can rnams kyi @15a * //
analyzed: rdo rje dang 'dra ba mi phyed pa'i thugs mnga' bas na rdo rje sems dpa'o //üîΩsems can rnams kyi @15a * //
translated: He is called ‚ÄúVajrasattva‚Äù because he has an indivisible mind that is like a vajra.üîΩHe is called ‚Äúthe one who is adorned with a garland of blood-dripping heads‚Äù because he is adorned with a garland of the heads of the four mƒÅras, which are dripping with blood.

original: don mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: don mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: He is a great being because he performs benefits.

original: rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pas na rdo rje rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the Vajra King because he is the chief of the Vajra family.

original: shin tu phul du byung zhing lhun gyis grub pa'i bde ba la 'bab pa'i ngo bo yin pas na bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: shin tu phul du byung zhing lhun gyis grub pa'i bde ba la 'bab pa'i ngo bo yin pas na bde ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Bliss because he is the essence of the most excellent, spontaneous bliss.

original: shin tu drag pas sems can rnams 'dul bas na rdo rje drag po'o ;
analyzed: shin tu drag pas sems can rnams 'dul bas na rdo rje drag po'o ;
translated: He is the Vajra Wrath because he subdues sentient beings with his great wrath.

original: / rab tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na dga' ba chen po'o //
analyzed: / rab tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na dga' ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Joy because he has the nature of supreme joy.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: Vajra Humkara is the Conqueror of the Three Worlds.

original: de'i gzugs kyis gnas nas sems can ma rungs pa rnams skrag par byed pa'i phyir na rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gzugs kyis gnas nas sems can ma rungs pa rnams skrag par byed pa'i phyir na rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrogs pa'o //
translated: He is the Vajra Hum because he frightens evil sentient beings with his form, and he is the one who utters the sound hum.

original: rdo rjes mtshon pa'i mda' bsnams pas na mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshon pa'i mda' bsnams pas na mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa'o //
translated: He is the Bearer of the Vajra Arrow because he holds an arrow marked with a vajra.

original: nye bar dmigs pa'i mi shes pa ma lus par gcod pas na rdo rje ral gri'o //
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa'i mi shes pa ma lus par gcod pas na rdo rje ral gri'o //
translated: He is the Vajra Sword because he cuts through all the ignorance of objective reference.

original: shes rab 'chal pa gcod pas na ma lus par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab 'chal pa gcod pas na ma lus par gcod pa'o //
translated: He is the complete cutter because he cuts off all bad wisdoms.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pas na rdo rje kun 'chang ngo //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pas na rdo rje kun 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the holder of all vajras because he imagines the vajra cross.

original: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni mtshan no //
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni mtshan no //
translated: The one called Vajrin is the name.

original: mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje gcig pu nyid gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje gcig pu'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje gcig pu nyid gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje gcig pu'o //
translated: He is the single vajra because he has the single vajra that has the nature of being indivisible.

original: bdud kyi g-yul las rgyal bas na g-yul sel ba'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi g-yul las rgyal bas na g-yul sel ba'o //
translated: He is the destroyer of the battle because he conquers the battle of Mara.

original: rdo rje 'bar bas 'joms shing dmar ser can gyi mig shin tu mi bzad pa gang yin pa de ni /üîΩrdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar bas 'joms shing dmar ser can gyi mig shin tu mi bzad pa gang yin pa de ni / rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
translated: He is the vajra blazing eye because he has the blazing vajra eye that is very fierce and red.

original: ces bya'o // rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis sreg par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgra gang la yod pa de ni sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste'o //
analyzed: ces bya'o // rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis sreg par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgra gang la yod pa de ni sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste'o //
translated: He is the sound of the blazing vajra because he has the sound that has the nature of burning with the blazing vajras.

original: rdo rjes sems can gdug pa can rnams 'bebs pas na rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes sems can gdug pa can rnams 'bebs pas na rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
translated: He is the vajra subduer because he subdues the wicked beings with the vajra.

original: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'bebs pas na 'bebs pa che'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'bebs pas na 'bebs pa che'o //
translated: He is the great subduer because he subdues Mahesvara and so forth.

original: dngos po'i chos ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa'i don gzigs pa'i spyan brgya snyed kyis gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mig brgya pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa'i don gzigs pa'i spyan brgya snyed kyis gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mig brgya pa'o //
translated: The one who has a hundred eyes that see the meaning of the way things are, the way things abide, is the one with a hundred eyes.

original: de rnams kyang rdo rje 'bar ba dang ldan pas na rdo rje'i mig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyang rdo rje 'bar ba dang ldan pas na rdo rje'i mig go //
translated: And since those eyes are endowed with blazing vajras, they are vajra eyes.

original: rdo rje'i gzugs can gyi ba spu ni shin tu rno ba myu gu lta bu gang la yod pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gzugs can gyi ba spu ni shin tu rno ba myu gu lta bu gang la yod pa ste //
translated: The one who has body hairs that are like very sharp sprouts and are made of vajra

original: des na 'di ni lus rdo rje'i ba spu can no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni lus rdo rje'i ba spu can no //
translated: is the one with vajra body hairs.

original: tha mal ba'i ba spu mi mnga' bas na rdo rje'i spu gnyis su med pa'i lus gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus so //
analyzed: tha mal ba'i ba spu mi mnga' bas na rdo rje'i spu gnyis su med pa'i lus gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus so //
translated: The one who has a vajra body that is without ordinary body hairs is the one with a single vajra body hair.

original: shin tu brtan zhing sra ba'i lus rdo rje'i rtse mo rnams las bsgrubs shing skyes pa'i sen mo gang la yod pa de ni sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse'o //
analyzed: shin tu brtan zhing sra ba'i lus rdo rje'i rtse mo rnams las bsgrubs shing skyes pa'i sen mo gang la yod pa de ni sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse'o //
translated: The one who has nails that are produced from the tips of vajra-like, very firm and hard body parts is the one with nails that are born from the tips of vajras.

original: rdo rje ltar snying po mkhregs shing sra ba'i pags pa gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje @15b snying po pags pa mkhregs so //
analyzed: rdo rje ltar snying po mkhregs shing sra ba'i pags pa gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje @15b snying po pags pa mkhregs so //
translated: He has skin that is hard and solid like the essence of a diamond, thus he is Vajra-essence-hard-skin.

original: rdo rje'i phreng ba bsnams pas rdo rje phreng thogs so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phreng ba bsnams pas rdo rje phreng thogs so //
translated: He holds a vajra garland, thus he is Vajra-garland-holder.

original: ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
translated: He is glorious because he possesses the lord of wisdom.

original: rdo rjes mtshon pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa yin pas na rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshon pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa yin pas na rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with ornaments marked with vajras, thus he is Vajra-adorned-with-ornaments.

original: gang rgyangs zhes pa'i bzhad pa sgrogs par mdzad pas na gang rgyangs h'a h'a'o //
analyzed: gang rgyangs zhes pa'i bzhad pa sgrogs par mdzad pas na gang rgyangs h'a h'a'o //
translated: He laughs with a loud ‚Äúha ha,‚Äù thus he is Loud-ha-ha.

original: chos nyid nges par sgrogs pas na nges par sgrogs so //
analyzed: chos nyid nges par sgrogs pas na nges par sgrogs so //
translated: He proclaims the nature of reality, thus he is Proclaimer.

original: yi ge drug pa'i gsang sngags kyi bdag nyid can yin pas yi ge drug pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge drug pa'i gsang sngags kyi bdag nyid can yin pas yi ge drug pa'o //
translated: He is the essence of the six-syllable mantra, thus he is Six-syllable.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i sgra yin pas na rdo rje sgra'o //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i sgra yin pas na rdo rje sgra'o //
translated: He is the sound of the Vajra Vehicle, thus he is Vajra-sound.

original: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i gsung gang la yod pa de ni 'jam dbyangs so ;
analyzed: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i gsung gang la yod pa de ni 'jam dbyangs so ;
translated: He has a voice that is smooth and gentle, thus he is Smooth-voice.

original: / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs pas na sgra che ba'o //
analyzed: / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs pas na sgra che ba'o //
translated: It is the great sound because it proclaims the sound of selflessness.

original: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig gis gnyis su med pa chen po nyid ston pa'i sgra sgrogs pas 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig gis gnyis su med pa chen po nyid ston pa'i sgra sgrogs pas 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa'o //
translated: It is the single sound in the three worlds because it proclaims the sound of the great nonduality in the three worlds.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par sgra sgrogs pa dang ldan pas na nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par sgra sgrogs pa dang ldan pas na nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa'o //
translated: It is the sound that reaches the end of space because it is endowed with the sound that reaches the end of the realm of space.

original: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na dam pa yin pas na sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ste dam pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na dam pa yin pas na sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ste dam pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme of all sounds because it is the best of all sounds.

original: yang dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs kyis de kho na nyid ston pas na /üîΩyang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid /
analyzed: yang dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs kyis de kho na nyid ston pas na / yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid /
translated: It is the suchness, the reality limit, and the perfect, because it teaches reality by means of the synonyms suchness, reality limit, and perfect.üîΩIt is the suchness, the reality limit, and the perfect.

original: yang dag mtha' ste zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ste zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the suchness, the reality limit, and the perfect.

original: yi ge thams cad kyi brjod du med pas na yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge thams cad kyi brjod du med pas na yi ge med pa'o //
translated: It is the signless because it is inexpressible by any letters.

original: stong pa nyid gsungs pa'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na stong nyid smra ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gsungs pa'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na stong nyid smra ba'o //
translated: He is the speaker of emptiness because he possesses the way of speaking about emptiness.

original: smra ba po thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas na smra ba'i khyu mchog go //
analyzed: smra ba po thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas na smra ba'i khyu mchog go //
translated: He is the bull of speakers because he is the chief of all speakers.

original: stong pa nyid rab tu ston pa'i zab cing rgya che ba sgrogs pa gang yin pa de ni zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rab tu ston pa'i zab cing rgya che ba sgrogs pa gang yin pa de ni zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa'o //
translated: He is the one who proclaims the profound and vast teachings of emptiness because he proclaims the sound of the profound and vast.

original: chos kyi dung 'bud pas na chos kyi dung ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi dung 'bud pas na chos kyi dung ngo //
translated: He is the Dharma conch because he blows the conch of the Dharma.

original: bsod nams chen po'i sgra sgrogs pas na sgra chen no //
analyzed: bsod nams chen po'i sgra sgrogs pas na sgra chen no //
translated: He is MahƒÅsthƒÅnaprƒÅpta because he proclaims the sound of great merit.

original: chos kyi gand'is bdud kyi yul rnam par skrag par mdzad pas na chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che'o //
analyzed: chos kyi gand'is bdud kyi yul rnam par skrag par mdzad pas na chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che'o //
translated: He is the great sound of the Dharma conch because he frightens the domain of MƒÅra with the sound of the Dharma conch.

original: gnas pa ni ston pa ste /
analyzed: gnas pa ni ston pa ste /
translated: Abiding means teaching.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pas na mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pas na mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po'o //
translated: He is the one who does not abide in nirvƒÅ·πáa because he does not abide in sa·πÉsƒÅra or nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che brdung bas na chos kyi rnga bo che'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che brdung bas na chos kyi rnga bo che'o //
translated: He is the great sound of the Dharma conch because he beats the great drum of the Dharma in the ten directions.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid pas na gzugs med pa'o //üîΩmtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sku'i @16a * //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid pas na gzugs med pa'o // mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sku'i @16a * //
translated: It is formless, because it is the very essence of the dharmadhatu.

original: bdag nyid can pas na gzugs bzang dam pa ste'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid can pas na gzugs bzang dam pa ste'o //
translated: It is the best of beautiful forms, because it is the embodiment of the body that is the perfection of all the major and minor marks.

original: sprul pa'i skus gdul bya sna tshogs pa dang rjes su mthun pas yang dag par bstan pas na sna tshogs gzugs can no //
analyzed: sprul pa'i skus gdul bya sna tshogs pa dang rjes su mthun pas yang dag par bstan pas na sna tshogs gzugs can no //
translated: It has various forms, because it is revealed in various ways in accordance with the various beings to be trained by the emanation body.

original: phyi rol gyi don gyis stong zhing yid tsam pa nyid pas na yid las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don gyis stong zhing yid tsam pa nyid pas na yid las skyes pa'o //
translated: It is born of the mind, because it is empty of external objects and is mind only.

original: gzugs can thams cad snang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pas na gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal lo //
analyzed: gzugs can thams cad snang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pas na gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal lo //
translated: It is the glory of the manifestation of all forms, because it possesses the lordship of the manifestation of all forms.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa gdul bar bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs su gcig par ston pa'i gzugs brnyan 'chang bas gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa gdul bar bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs su gcig par ston pa'i gzugs brnyan 'chang bas gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po'o //
translated: It is the bearer of all reflections, because it is the reflection that manifests in the form of sravakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas and so on, in order to train all worlds.

original: thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i nus pas mi g-yo ba dang ldan pas na tshugs pa med cing ngo //
analyzed: thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i nus pas mi g-yo ba dang ldan pas na tshugs pa med cing ngo //
translated: He is unassailable because he is endowed with unshakability through the power of being unobstructed in all ways.

original: khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na cher grags pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na cher grags pa'o //
translated: He is greatly renowned because he is the lord of all three realms.

original: khams gsum du ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste'o //
analyzed: khams gsum du ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste'o //
translated: He is the great lord of the three realms because he is endowed with the sovereignty of gnosis in the three realms.

original: 'phags pa'i lam mtho zhing 'phags pa la zhugs pas na 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam mtho zhing 'phags pa la zhugs pas na 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas pa'o //
translated: He is situated on the exalted path because he is exalted and has entered the exalted path.

original: gang zhe na dar ba chen po chos kyi tog ste /
analyzed: gang zhe na dar ba chen po chos kyi tog ste /
translated: What is that? It is the great prosperity, the banner of Dharma.

original: dar ba chen po'i rgyur gyur pas na dar ba chen po'o //
analyzed: dar ba chen po'i rgyur gyur pas na dar ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the great prosperity because he is the cause of great prosperity.

original: chos kyi tog ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan no //
analyzed: chos kyi tog ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan no //
translated: The banner of Dharma is the victory banner of Dharma.

original: 'jig rten gsum po dag na gzhon nu'i lus kyi sku 'chang ba gcig pu nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po dag na gzhon nu'i lus kyi sku 'chang ba gcig pu nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig pa'o //
translated: He is the sole youth body in the three worlds, and that is the sole youth body in the three worlds.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pas na thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pas na gnas brtan no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pas na thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pas na gnas brtan no //
translated: He is the elder of the Bodhisattva Sangha, and so is worthy of the homage of all, and so is the Elder.

original: thams cad mkhyen pas bgres pas na rgan po'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas bgres pas na rgan po'o //
translated: He is the senior of all the Omniscient Ones, and so is the Senior.

original: skye dgu ma lus ba skyong bas na skye dgu'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: skye dgu ma lus ba skyong bas na skye dgu'i bdag po'o //
translated: He is the lord of all living beings, and so is the Lord of Beings.

original: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa la sogs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' bas na sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa la sogs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' bas na sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba'o //
translated: He bears the thirty-two marks of a superman, such as having the soles of his feet marked with wheels, and so he is the Bearer of the Thirty-two Marks.

original: 'od dang ldan pas na sdu gu'o //
analyzed: 'od dang ldan pas na sdu gu'o //
translated: He is handsome, because he is endowed with radiance.

original: yan lag gi cha shas legs par rdzogs pas na 'jig rten gsum na mdzes pa'o //üîΩ'jig rten pa'i shes pa dang / yon tan gyi pha rol tu son pas na 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te'o //
analyzed: yan lag gi cha shas legs par rdzogs pas na 'jig rten gsum na mdzes pa'o // 'jig rten pa'i shes pa dang / yon tan gyi pha rol tu son pas na 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te'o //
translated: He is beautiful in the three worlds, because his limbs are perfectly formed.üîΩHe is the teacher of the world, because he has reached the other shore of worldly knowledge and good qualities.

original: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad rnams la shin tu mkhas pas na 'jig rten slob dpon no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad rnams la shin tu mkhas pas na 'jig rten slob dpon no //
translated: He is the master of the world, because he is very skilled in worldly conventions.

original: rgol ba thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na @16b 'jigs pa med pa ste mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rgol ba thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na @16b 'jigs pa med pa ste mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is fearless, a scholar, because he overwhelms all adversaries.

original: 'gro dang ldog pa thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pas na mgon po'o //
analyzed: 'gro dang ldog pa thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pas na mgon po'o //
translated: He is the protector, the guardian of all who go and come.

original: sems can ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa rnams las skyob pas na skyob pa'o //
analyzed: sems can ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa rnams las skyob pas na skyob pa'o //
translated: He is the refuge, the protector of beings from the terrors of the miserable states of existence.

original: 'jig rten gsum la slu ba med pas na 'jig rten yid gcugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum la slu ba med pas na 'jig rten yid gcugs pa'o //
translated: He is the friend of the world, because he is never deceitful in the three worlds.

original: nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi 'jigs pas skrag pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur pas na skyabs dang ngo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi 'jigs pas skrag pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur pas na skyabs dang ngo //
translated: He is the refuge of those who are frightened by the terrors of all the enemies, the afflictions.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud skyob pas na skyob pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud skyob pas na skyob pa'o //
translated: He is the protector, because he protects the stream of consciousness of all beings.

original: 'di'i gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
translated: He is the unsurpassed, because there is nothing higher than him.

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar longs spyod kyis khyab pa'i chos dang zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis yang dag pa'i longs spyod la spyod pas na nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar longs spyod kyis khyab pa'i chos dang zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis yang dag pa'i longs spyod la spyod pas na nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa'o //
translated: He is the enjoyer of the infinite, because he enjoys the true enjoyments which are characterized by the enjoyment of the Dharma, of material things, and of fearlessness, and which extend to the limits of space.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che dang 'dra bas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho'o //üîΩma rig pa'i sgo nga nyid ni de kho na nyid rab tu 'gebs pas na sbubs so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che dang 'dra bas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho'o // ma rig pa'i sgo nga nyid ni de kho na nyid rab tu 'gebs pas na sbubs so //
translated: The ocean of omniscient wisdom is like a precious gem, because it is the gem of omniscient wisdom.üîΩThe egg of ignorance is the shell, because it completely covers reality.

original: de yang dag par 'byed cing rnam par 'joms pas nam rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dag par 'byed cing rnam par 'joms pas nam rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed ba'o //
translated: It is the one who breaks the shell of ignorance, because it completely opens and destroys that.

original: srid pa nyid dra ba yin la /
analyzed: srid pa nyid dra ba yin la /
translated: The net of existence is the net,

original: shes rab kyi ral gris rnam par 'joms pas na srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi ral gris rnam par 'joms pas na srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po'o //
translated: because it is the one who destroys the net of existence with the sword of wisdom.

original: nyon mongs ma lus pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma lus pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa'o //
translated: The one who pacifies all afflictions is the one who pacifies all afflictions.

original: gang gi phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba de nyid kyis na 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba de nyid kyis na 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin pa nyid de /
translated: Because of being free from all afflictions, it is the one who goes beyond the ocean of cyclic existence,

original: nyes pa dang bral bas 'khor ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyes pa dang bral bas 'khor ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to be in cyclic existence due to being free from faults.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba mnga' bas na ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can no //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba mnga' bas na ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can no //
translated: He is the one who is crowned with the diadem of consecration in the gnosis of omniscience, and so he is the one who is crowned with the diadem of consecration in gnosis.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal lo //
translated: The perfect Buddha is the ornament, the Lord Manjusri.

original: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gsum ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gsum ste /
translated: The three kinds of suffering are the suffering of suffering, the suffering of change, and the suffering of the formative forces.

original: de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gsum zhi bar mdzad pas na sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gsum zhi bar mdzad pas na sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi ba'o //
translated: He is the one who pacifies the three kinds of suffering of those sentient beings, and so he is the one who pacifies the three kinds of suffering.

original: bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gsum mthar phyin par mdzad pas na gsum sel lo //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gsum mthar phyin par mdzad pas na gsum sel lo //
translated: He is the one who has brought his own three kinds of suffering to an end, and so he is the one who has brought the three to an end.

original: sems can dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad pas na mtha' yas so //
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad pas na mtha' yas so //
translated: He is the one who acts for the benefit of innumerable sentient beings, and so he is the infinite one.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi phyed pa'i rnam par @17a * //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi phyed pa'i rnam par @17a * //
translated: He is the one who is not divided by the Sravakas, the Pratyekabuddhas and the perfect Buddha, and so he is the one who is not divided.

original: grol ba gsum 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams kyi ngor gshegs pas na grol gsum thob pa'o //
analyzed: grol ba gsum 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams kyi ngor gshegs pas na grol gsum thob pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has attained the three liberations, because he has come for the sake of those beings who are to be disciplined by the three liberations.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa dang bral bas na sgrib pa gsum las nges par grol ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa dang bral bas na sgrib pa gsum las nges par grol ba'o //
translated: He is the one who is definitely liberated from the three obscurations, because he is free from the obscurations of the afflictions, the obscurations to knowing, and the obscurations of karma.

original: sgrib ba rnam par dag pas nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pas na nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib ba rnam par dag pas nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pas na nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'o //
translated: He is the one who abides in the equality of space, because he abides in the essence of the dharmadhatu, which is equal like space, due to the purity of obscurations.

original: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad las 'das pas na nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad las 'das pas na nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has transcended all the stains of the afflictions, because he has gone beyond all the stains of the afflictions.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ste dus gsum las 'das pas na dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ste dus gsum las 'das pas na dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po'o //
translated: He is the one who has realized the three times as being beyond time, because he has gone beyond the three times, the past, future, and present.

original: dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char gyis sems can gyi rgyud tshim par mdzad pa'i phyir sems can kun gyi klu chen po'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char gyis sems can gyi rgyud tshim par mdzad pa'i phyir sems can kun gyi klu chen po'o //
translated: He is the great naga of all sentient beings, because he satisfies the mindstreams of sentient beings with the rain of the nectar of the sublime Dharma.

original: yon tan nyid thod dam rtse mo yin la /
analyzed: yon tan nyid thod dam rtse mo yin la /
translated: The summit of good qualities is the crest or peak.

original: yon tan gyi thod de thod du byas pas na yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod de mchog tu gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyi thod de thod du byas pas na yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod de mchog tu gyur ba'o //
translated: Since that crest of good qualities is made into a crest, it is the crest of those who have crests, which is the best.

original: glo bur pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las nges par grol bas na nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: glo bur pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las nges par grol bas na nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: Since it is definitely liberated from the afflictions that are adventitious, it is completely liberated from all afflictions.

original: de nyid kyis na nam mkha'i lam ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na nam mkha'i lam ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis te /
translated: Since it is the path of space, the expanse of nonconceptual dharmas,

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis mi g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu gnas pas na nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis mi g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu gnas pas na nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa'o //
translated: it is well established in the nature of non-movement by way of its identity, so it is well established on the path of space.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzugs 'dzin pas ni yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang ngo //
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzugs 'dzin pas ni yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang ngo //
translated: Since it holds the form of a wish-fulfilling jewel, it is the holder of the great wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: khyab pas na khyab bdag go //
analyzed: khyab pas na khyab bdag go //
translated: Since it pervades, it is the lord of pervasion.

original: sems can thams cad kyi ji ltar 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa nyid kyis na rin chen kun gyi mchog go //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ji ltar 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa nyid kyis na rin chen kun gyi mchog go //
translated: Since it completely fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings, it is the supreme of all jewels.

original: sems can thams cad mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po rdzogs par mdzad pas na dpag bsam shing chen no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po rdzogs par mdzad pas na dpag bsam shing chen no //
translated: It is the great wish-fulfilling tree, since it fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: thams cad du khyab pa'i grib ma dang ldan pas na rgyas pa ste'o //
analyzed: thams cad du khyab pa'i grib ma dang ldan pas na rgyas pa ste'o //
translated: It is the great cloud, since it pervades everywhere with its rain of Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad la bde ba stsol pa ni bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bde ba stsol pa ni bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog go //
translated: It is the excellent vase, since it bestows happiness on all sentient beings.

original: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pas na byed pa sems can kun don byed do //
analyzed: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pas na byed pa sems can kun don byed do //
translated: It is the agent that acts for the welfare of all sentient beings, since it acts for the welfare of all sentient beings through the power of its former prayers.

original: rnam pa thams cad du gzhan la phan pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na phan 'dogs mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gzhan la phan pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na phan 'dogs mdzad do //
translated: It is the benefactor, since it completely benefits others in every way.

original: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa gces pa ltar mnyes gshin pas na sems can mnyes gshin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa gces pa ltar mnyes gshin pas na sems can mnyes gshin pa'o //
translated: It is the friend of sentient beings, since it is dear to all sentient beings, like a dear and only child.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu mtho @17b ris dang dmyal ba yongs su mkhyen pas na bzang ngan shes pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu mtho @17b ris dang dmyal ba yongs su mkhyen pas na bzang ngan shes pa'o //
translated: It is the knower of good and bad, since it knows the results of virtue and nonvirtue, such as high status and miserable realms.

original: bya ba dang dus kyi rnam par 'byed pa mngon du yongs su mkhyen pas na dus shes pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang dus kyi rnam par 'byed pa mngon du yongs su mkhyen pas na dus shes pa'o //
translated: He is the knower of time because he fully knows the distinctions of action and time.

original: thams cad du khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid bas na khyab bdag go //
analyzed: thams cad du khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid bas na khyab bdag go //
translated: He is the lord of all because he is the nature of the all-pervading dharmadhatu.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su mkhyen pas na dam tshig shes pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su mkhyen pas na dam tshig shes pa'o //
translated: He is the knower of samaya because he fully knows the afflictions.

original: grub pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi dngos grub dang dam tshig yongs su mkhyen pa mnga' bas na dam tshig ldan no //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi dngos grub dang dam tshig yongs su mkhyen pa mnga' bas na dam tshig ldan no //
translated: He is the one with samaya because he possesses the knowledge of the siddhis and samayas of all tenets.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i dus las mi 'da' bar 'dul bar mdzad pas na dus shes pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i dus las mi 'da' bar 'dul bar mdzad pas na dus shes pa'o //
translated: He is the knower of time because he tames without transgressing the time for ripening sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams kyi dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po mkhyen pas na sems can dbang don shes so //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po mkhyen pas na sems can dbang don shes so //
translated: He is the knower of the faculties of sentient beings because he knows the faculties of faith and so on of sentient beings.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba nyon mongs pa dang rnam par bral ba'i bdag nyid can yongs su mkhyen pas na rnam pa gsum la mkhas pa po'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba nyon mongs pa dang rnam par bral ba'i bdag nyid can yongs su mkhyen pas na rnam pa gsum la mkhas pa po'o //
translated: He is skilled in the three, because he knows the three kinds of liberation of the disciples, the hermit buddhas, and the perfect buddhas, which are characterized by freedom from the afflictions.

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa ni yon tan te ;
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa ni yon tan te ;
translated: The strengths and fearlessnesses are excellences.

original: de rnams 'di la mnga' bas na yon tan ldan no //
analyzed: de rnams 'di la mnga' bas na yon tan ldan no //
translated: He is endowed with excellences, because he possesses those.

original: gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang mkhyen pas na yon tan shes pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang mkhyen pas na yon tan shes pa'o //
translated: He is the knower of excellences, because he also knows the excellences that exist in the mental continua of others.

original: chos rnams sgyu ma dang 'dra ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas na chos shes pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams sgyu ma dang 'dra ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas na chos shes pa'o //
translated: He is the knower of reality, because he knows things as they are through the mode of their being like an illusion, and so forth.

original: bsod nams kyi rang bzhin yin pas na bkra shis so //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi rang bzhin yin pas na bkra shis so //
translated: It is auspicious, because it is the nature of merit.

original: bkra shis thams cad kyang 'di las byung bas na bkra shis 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bkra shis thams cad kyang 'di las byung bas na bkra shis 'byung ngo //
translated: It is the source of auspiciousness, because all auspiciousness arises from it.

original: bkra shis thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa'o //
analyzed: bkra shis thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa'o //
translated: It is the auspiciousness of all auspiciousness, because it is the nature of all auspiciousness.

original: grags pa'i rgyur gyur pas na'am bsod nams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis kun gyis bsgrags pas na grags pa'o //
analyzed: grags pa'i rgyur gyur pas na'am bsod nams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis kun gyis bsgrags pas na grags pa'o //
translated: It is renowned because it is the cause of fame, or because it is renowned by all because of its very nature of merit.

original: dpal gyi gnas su gyur pas na bkra shis pa'o //
analyzed: dpal gyi gnas su gyur pas na bkra shis pa'o //
translated: It is auspicious because it is the basis of glory.

original: yon tan thams cad dri ma med pa'i snyan pa grags pas na snyan grags so //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad dri ma med pa'i snyan pa grags pas na snyan grags so //
translated: It is fame because it is the fame of stainless good qualities.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na dge ba'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na dge ba'o //
translated: It is virtue because it is the very nature of virtue by its very nature of merit and wisdom.

original: thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin pa'i gnas su gyur pas na dbugs 'byin chen po'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin pa'i gnas su gyur pas na dbugs 'byin chen po'o //
translated: It is the great relief because it is the basis of relief for all.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa yang dag par ston pa'i dga' ston chen po mnga' bas na dga' ston chen po'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa yang dag par ston pa'i dga' ston chen po mnga' bas na dga' ston chen po'o //
translated: It is the great festival because it is the great festival of the teaching of generosity and so on.

original: sems can rnams kyi dga' ba'i mchog tu gyur pas na dga' chen no //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dga' ba'i mchog tu gyur pas na dga' chen no //
translated: It is the great joy because it is the supreme joy of sentient beings.

original: 'tshang rgya ba dang che bas thob pa'i rol mo gang yin pa de ni rol mo che'o //
analyzed: 'tshang rgya ba dang che bas thob pa'i rol mo gang yin pa de ni rol mo che'o //
translated: It is the great play because it is the play obtained through great enlightenment.

original: mchod pa la sogs pa'i bkur sti thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bkur sti'o //
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs pa'i bkur sti thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bkur sti'o //
translated: Honor is the possession of all worship and so on.

original: @18a * // mdzes par byed pa'i bya bas sems can rnams kyi don rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rim gro'o //
analyzed: @18a * // mdzes par byed pa'i bya bas sems can rnams kyi don rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rim gro'o //
translated: Service is the fulfillment of the aims of beings by means of pleasing activities.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi 'byor pa dang ldan pas na phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi 'byor pa dang ldan pas na phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: Perfection is the possession of the wealth of the collections of merit and knowledge.

original: rtag tu bde ba dang yid bde ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na mchog tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rtag tu bde ba dang yid bde ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na mchog tu dga' ba'o //
translated: Supreme joy is the nature of constant happiness and mental pleasure.

original: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa'i yon tan gyi grags pa'i bdag por gyur pas na grags bdag go //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa'i yon tan gyi grags pa'i bdag por gyur pas na grags bdag go //
translated: Glory is the possession of the glory of the qualities of complete purification in every way.

original: chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal dang ldan pas na dpal lo //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal dang ldan pas na dpal lo //
translated: Splendor is the possession of the splendor of the Dharma King.

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyi mchog dang ldan pas na mchog ldan no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyi mchog dang ldan pas na mchog ldan no //
translated: Possessing the supreme is the possession of supreme buddhahood.

original: mchog stsol bar 'os pas na mchog sbyin no ;
analyzed: mchog stsol bar 'os pas na mchog sbyin no ;
translated: Granting the supreme is the bestowal of the supreme.

original: / thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na gtso bo'o //
analyzed: / thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na gtso bo'o //
translated: Chief is the state of being the best of all.

original: skyabs rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na skyabs kyi dam pa'o //
analyzed: skyabs rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na skyabs kyi dam pa'o //
translated: It is the highest refuge because it is the best of all refuges.

original: 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i skyabs su 'os pas na skyabs su 'os pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i skyabs su 'os pas na skyabs su 'os pa'o //
translated: It is worthy of refuge because it is worthy of being a refuge for those who are afraid of samsara.

original: seng ge la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra'i gzugs can du gyur pas na 'jigs chen dgra'o //
analyzed: seng ge la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra'i gzugs can du gyur pas na 'jigs chen dgra'o //
translated: It is the great fearsome enemy because it has the form of a great fearsome enemy such as a lion.

original: bdag med pa gnyis thugs su chud pas na rab kyi mchog go //
analyzed: bdag med pa gnyis thugs su chud pas na rab kyi mchog go //
translated: It is the best of the best because it has realized the two kinds of no-self.

original: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa ma lus par sel bar mdzad pas na 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa ma lus par sel bar mdzad pas na 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba'o //
translated: It is the remover of all fears because it removes all the fears of samsara.

original: gtsug phud tsam 'jog pas na gtsug phud do //üîΩrma bya la bcibs pas na gtsug phud can no //
analyzed: gtsug phud tsam 'jog pas na gtsug phud do // rma bya la bcibs pas na gtsug phud can no //
translated: It is the topknot because it is the topknot.üîΩIt is the topknotted one because it rides on a peacock.

original: lcang lo 'dzin pas na lcang lo can no //
analyzed: lcang lo 'dzin pas na lcang lo can no //
translated: It is the one with a topknot because it holds a garland.

original: ral ba bsgyings pa dang ldan pas na ral ba can no //
analyzed: ral ba bsgyings pa dang ldan pas na ral ba can no //
translated: It is the one with matted hair because it has matted hair.

original: gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba'i rtags 'dzin pas na munydza'o //
analyzed: gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba'i rtags 'dzin pas na munydza'o //
translated: It is the one with matted hair because it holds the sign of renunciation for the sake of those to be tamed.

original: nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i cod pan 'chang bas na cod pan thogs pa'o //
analyzed: nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i cod pan 'chang bas na cod pan thogs pa'o //
translated: He is crowned with the crest-jewel of all jewels.

original: zhal lnga dang ldan pas na gdong lnga'o //
analyzed: zhal lnga dang ldan pas na gdong lnga'o //
translated: He has five faces.

original: gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi gtsug bud mnga' bas na gtsug bud lnga dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi gtsug bud mnga' bas na gtsug bud lnga dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has five topknots, because he has the topknot of a youthful form.

original: zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi thod dang ldan pa'i cod pan mnga' ba gang yin pa de ni zur phud lnga pa me tog thod do //
analyzed: zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi thod dang ldan pa'i cod pan mnga' ba gang yin pa de ni zur phud lnga pa me tog thod do //
translated: He has five locks of hair, because he has a crest-jewel with a flower garland of five locks of hair.

original: mgo bregs shing ska rags 'chang bas na mgo zlum mo //
analyzed: mgo bregs shing ska rags 'chang bas na mgo zlum mo //
translated: He is shaven-headed, because he wears a belt.

original: brtul zhugs chen po'i sngags spyod pa 'dzin pas na brtul zhugs chen po'o //
analyzed: brtul zhugs chen po'i sngags spyod pa 'dzin pas na brtul zhugs chen po'o //
translated: He is a great ascetic, because he upholds the practice of the mantra of great asceticism.

original: ye shes kyi tshangs pa dang spyod pas na tshangs par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshangs pa dang spyod pas na tshangs par spyod pa'o //
translated: He is celibate, because of his knowledge and conduct.

original: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi brtul zhugs mchog go //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi brtul zhugs mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme vow of the way of secret mantra.

original: dka' thub kyi mthar phyin pa brnyes pas na dka' thub mthar phyin no //
analyzed: dka' thub kyi mthar phyin pa brnyes pas na dka' thub mthar phyin no //
translated: He has perfected asceticism, because he has attained the culmination of austerities.

original: sku gsung thugs chen po bsgom pa'i dka' thub dang ldan pas na dka' thub chen po'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs chen po bsgom pa'i dka' thub dang ldan pas na dka' thub chen po'o //
translated: He is the Great Ascetic because he is endowed with the austerity of meditating on the Great Body, Speech, and Mind.

original: dkyil @18b 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur bas bkrus pas na gtsang gnas so //
analyzed: dkyil @18b 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur bas bkrus pas na gtsang gnas so //
translated: He is the Pure One because he is purified by the consecration of the Great Mandala.

original: thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na dam pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na dam pa'o //
translated: He is the Holy One because he is the chief of all.

original: goo ta ma la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams 'dul bas na goo ta ma'o //
analyzed: goo ta ma la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams 'dul bas na goo ta ma'o //
translated: He is the Gautama because he disciplines the Rishis such as Gautama.

original: srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bas na bram ze'o //
analyzed: srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bas na bram ze'o //
translated: He is the Brahmin because he is free from all sins such as killing.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshangs pa mkhyen pas na tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshangs pa mkhyen pas na tshangs pa'o //
translated: He is the Brahma because he knows the Brahma of the Dharmadhatu.

original: gnyis su med pa'i tshangs pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i tshangs pa shes pa'o //
translated: He is the Non-dual Brahma because he knows the Brahma of Non-duality.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'o //
translated: He is the Brahma of Nirvana because he is the Nirvana of No-abiding.

original: de brnyes pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshangs pa thob pa po'o //
analyzed: de brnyes pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshangs pa thob pa po'o //
translated: He is the Attainer of the Brahma of Nirvana because he has attained it.

original: skye ba dang las dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa las ldog pas na grol ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang las dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa las ldog pas na grol ba'o //
translated: He is the Liberated One because he is free from birth, karma, suffering, and so forth.

original: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las thar bas na thar ba'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las thar bas na thar ba'o //
translated: It is liberation because it liberates from the bondage of cyclic existence, which is characterized by delusion.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i rnam par grol ba'i yan lag dang ldan pas na rnam grol lus so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i rnam par grol ba'i yan lag dang ldan pas na rnam grol lus so //
translated: It is the body of liberation because it is endowed with the liberated limbs of right view.

original: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs ma skyes pas na rnam grol lo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs ma skyes pas na rnam grol lo //
translated: It is liberation because various afflictions do not arise.

original: nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang bral bas na bzhi ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang bral bas na bzhi ba'o //
translated: It is peace because it is free from the harm and violence of afflictions.

original: sems can rnams kyi legs pa'i lam thob par mdzad pas na zhi ba nyid do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi legs pa'i lam thob par mdzad pas na zhi ba nyid do //
translated: It is peace because it causes sentient beings to attain the path of virtue.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is nirvana because it attains nonabiding nirvana.

original: rdzas su yod pa'i mya ngan las bzlog pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas su yod pa'i mya ngan las bzlog pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is nirvana because it is the opposite of substantial nirvana.

original: mar me dang 'dra bar thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na zhi ba'o //
analyzed: mar me dang 'dra bar thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na zhi ba'o //
translated: It is peace because it is the nature of the complete pacification of everything, like a flame.

original: sems can rnams kyi dge ba thob par byed pas na legs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dge ba thob par byed pas na legs pa'o //
translated: It is auspicious because it causes sentient beings to attain virtue.

original: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is nirvana because it is the definite emergence of the path of the way of secret mantra.

original: las zad par byed pas na mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: las zad par byed pas na mthar thug pa'o //
translated: It is the ultimate because it exhausts karma.

original: mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pas na bde sdug sel ba'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pas na bde sdug sel ba'o //
translated: It is the dispeller of happiness and suffering because it attains the samadhi of nonabiding.

original: mthar thug pa thob pas thams cad kyi rtse mo thob pas na mthar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug pa thob pas thams cad kyi rtse mo thob pas na mthar gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the ultimate because it attains the peak of all.

original: lus zad pa'i chags pa dang bral ba brnyes pas na chags bral lus las 'das pa po'o //
analyzed: lus zad pa'i chags pa dang bral ba brnyes pas na chags bral lus las 'das pa po'o //
translated: It is the one who transcends the body of attachment because it attains the freedom from the attachment of the exhaustion of the body.

original: bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis brgal bar mi nus pas na thub pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis brgal bar mi nus pas na thub pa med pa'o //
translated: It is the invincible because it cannot be challenged by maras and so on.

original: gnyis pa med pas na dpe med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa med pas na dpe med pa'o //
translated: It is the incomparable because it is without a second.

original: mngon par gsal ba'i sku med pas na mi mngon pa'o ;
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba'i sku med pas na mi mngon pa'o ;
translated: It is the invisible because it is without a manifest body.

original: / rnam pa thams cad dang bral bas na mi snang ba'o //
analyzed: / rnam pa thams cad dang bral bas na mi snang ba'o //
translated: It is the unmanifest because it is free from all aspects.

original: rnam pa gang gis kyang rtogs par mi nus pas na gsal byed min no //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis kyang rtogs par mi nus pas na gsal byed min no //
translated: It is the unmanifestor because it cannot be realized by any aspect.

original: dus thams cad las 'das pas na mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dus thams cad las 'das pas na mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is the unchanging because it transcends all time.

original: lus med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad du shes pas na kun du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: lus med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad du shes pas na kun du 'gro ba'o //
translated: It is all-pervading because it is cognized everywhere in a non-localized manner.

original: rtags ni khyab pa po'o //üîΩrnal @19a * //
analyzed: rtags ni khyab pa po'o // rnal @19a * //
translated: The sign is the pervader.

original: 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus pas na phra ba'o //
analyzed: 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus pas na phra ba'o //
translated: It is subtle because it cannot be realized even by the yogis.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa las grol bas na zag med do //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa las grol bas na zag med do //
translated: It is immaculate because it is free from the defilements of the impurities.

original: byang chub kyi sa bon yin zhing de nyid nyes pa'i skyon dang bral bas na sa bon bral lo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sa bon yin zhing de nyid nyes pa'i skyon dang bral bas na sa bon bral lo //
translated: It is free from the seed because it is the seed of enlightenment and is itself free from the faults of the impurities.

original: 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bas na rdul med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bas na rdul med pa'o //
translated: It is dustless because it is free from the dust of passion.

original: rdul thams cad kyis mgos bas na rdul bral lo //
analyzed: rdul thams cad kyis mgos bas na rdul bral lo //
translated: It is stainless because it is free from all dust.

original: bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dri ma med pa'o //
translated: It is immaculate because it is free from the stain of intention and latent dispositions.

original: gnas ngan len la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral bas na nyes pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ngan len la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral bas na nyes pa spangs pa'o //
translated: It is free from faults because it is free from the faults of negative tendencies and so forth.

original: nad thams cad dang bral bas na skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: nad thams cad dang bral bas na skyon med pa'o //
translated: It is faultless because it is free from all diseases.

original: chos thams cad thugs su chud pas na shin tu sang pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad thugs su chud pas na shin tu sang pa'o //
translated: It is very clear because it comprehends all phenomena.

original: nyes pa gsum gyi dri ma dang bral bas na sad pa'i bdag go //
analyzed: nyes pa gsum gyi dri ma dang bral bas na sad pa'i bdag go //
translated: He is the Awakened One because he is free from the stain of the three faults.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na kun shes so //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na kun shes so //
translated: He is the Omniscient One because he possesses the wisdom of the Sravakas and so forth.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis dngos po thams cad yang dag par rig pas na kun rig go //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis dngos po thams cad yang dag par rig pas na kun rig go //
translated: He is the Knower of all because he knows all things by the method of the Dharmadhatu.

original: de nyid mchog tu gyur pas na dam pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid mchog tu gyur pas na dam pa'o //
translated: He is the Supreme One because he is the best.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po dang bral bas na rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das so //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po dang bral bas na rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das so //
translated: He is beyond the reality of consciousness because he is free from the things of subject and object.

original: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mnga' bas na ye shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mnga' bas na ye shes so //
translated: He is the Wisdom because he possesses the wisdom of the non-duality of all things.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pas na gnyis med tshul 'chang pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pas na gnyis med tshul 'chang pa'o //
translated: He is the Holder of the Non-dual Method because he holds the nature of non-duality.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'das pas na rnam par rtog med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'das pas na rnam par rtog med do //
translated: He is the Non-conceptual because he is beyond all conceptual thoughts.

original: phyi rol gyi don la mi dpyod pas na lhun gyis grub ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la mi dpyod pas na lhun gyis grub ba'o //
translated: He is the Spontaneously Accomplished because he does not investigate external objects.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bzhin du sems can gyi bya ba mdzad pas na dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bzhin du sems can gyi bya ba mdzad pas na dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa'o //
translated: Since he acts for the sake of sentient beings like the Buddhas of the three times, he is the agent of the Buddhas of the three times.

original: chos thams cad thugs su chud pas na sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: chos thams cad thugs su chud pas na sangs rgyas so //
translated: He is the Buddha because he has realized all dharmas.

original: thog ma dang tha ma ni thog ma dang tha ma ste /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma ni thog ma dang tha ma ste /
translated: Beginning and end are the beginning and end.

original: gang la thog ma dang tha ma med pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste chos sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gang la thog ma dang tha ma med pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste chos sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: That which has no beginning and end is the beginningless and endless, which is the essence of the dharmakƒÅya.

original: dang po nyid nas chos nyid bdag nyid can yin pas na dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: dang po nyid nas chos nyid bdag nyid can yin pas na dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: Since he is the nature of reality from the very beginning, he is the primordial Buddha.

original: gang las kyang skye ba med pas na rgyu med pa'o //
analyzed: gang las kyang skye ba med pas na rgyu med pa'o //
translated: Since he is born from nothing, he is causeless.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi spyan gcig pus thams cad gzigs pas na ye shes mig gcig go //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi spyan gcig pus thams cad gzigs pas na ye shes mig gcig go //
translated: Since he sees everything with the single eye of wisdom, he is the single eye of wisdom.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dri ma med pa'o //
translated: Since he is free from the stains of attachment and so forth, he is stainless.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku gang la yod pa de ni ye shes lus can no //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku gang la yod pa de ni ye shes lus can no //
translated: He who has a body of the nature of wisdom is the one with a wisdom body.

original: ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa slar mi ldog par gshegs pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa slar mi ldog par gshegs pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: He is the Tathagata because he has gone to suchness, and he has gone to suchness in the same way that the former Tathagatas went, without turning back.

original: tshig gi dbang phyug yin pas @19b na tshig gi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: tshig gi dbang phyug yin pas @19b na tshig gi dbang phyug go //
translated: He is the Lord of Speech because he is the master of speech.

original: rgol ba rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pas na smra ba che ba'o //
analyzed: rgol ba rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pas na smra ba che ba'o //
translated: He is the Great Speaker because he cannot be outshone by opponents.

original: smra ba thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na smra ba'i skyes mchog go //üîΩtshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa'i smra ba po thams cad kyi nang na mdzes par smra bas na smra ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: smra ba thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na smra ba'i skyes mchog go // tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa'i smra ba po thams cad kyi nang na mdzes par smra bas na smra ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the Best of Speakers because he is the chief of all speakers.üîΩHe is the King of Speakers because he speaks beautifully among all speakers, such as Brahma and Indra.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa smra ba po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pas na smra ba'i dam pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa smra ba po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pas na smra ba'i dam pa'o //
translated: He is the Best of Speakers because he is the best of all speakers, such as Brahma.

original: mchog tu phul du byung bas gtso bor gyur pas na mchog gi gnas so //
analyzed: mchog tu phul du byung bas gtso bor gyur pas na mchog gi gnas so //
translated: He is the Supreme Abode because he is the chief, being the most excellent.

original: mu stegs ngan pa'i ri dags skrag par mdzad pas na smra ba'i seng ge'o //
analyzed: mu stegs ngan pa'i ri dags skrag par mdzad pas na smra ba'i seng ge'o //
translated: He is the Lion of Speakers because he frightens the wild beasts of bad philosophy.

original: de nyid kyis na gzhan gyis mi thub pas na tshugs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gzhan gyis mi thub pas na tshugs pa med pa'o //
translated: He is unassailable because he is not overcome by others.

original: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chud pas na kun du blta ba'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chud pas na kun du blta ba'o //
translated: He is all-seeing because he has realized the reality of all things.

original: rab tu dga' bas sku'i bde ba chen po 'phags pas na mchog tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' bas sku'i bde ba chen po 'phags pas na mchog tu dga' ba'o //
translated: He is supremely joyful because he is exalted by the bliss of his body of joy.

original: 'od zer 'phro ba'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i sku mnga' bas na gzi brjid phreng ba'o //
analyzed: 'od zer 'phro ba'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i sku mnga' bas na gzi brjid phreng ba'o //
translated: He is a garland of splendor because he has a body adorned with a garland of radiating light.

original: gzi brjid kyi phreng bas bskor yang zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang ldan pas na legs par snang ba'i phyir blta na sdug pa'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid kyi phreng bas bskor yang zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang ldan pas na legs par snang ba'i phyir blta na sdug pa'o //
translated: He is beautiful to behold because he is well-illuminated, having a body of the nature of peace, surrounded by a garland of splendor.

original: mi shes pa'i mun nag sel bar byed pa'i ye shes dam pa'i 'od mnga' bas ni 'od bzang ngo //
analyzed: mi shes pa'i mun nag sel bar byed pa'i ye shes dam pa'i 'od mnga' bas ni 'od bzang ngo //
translated: He is well-lighted because he has the light of sublime intuition, which dispels the darkness of ignorance.

original: ye shes kyi gzugs kyi shes bya rnams la khyab cing gsal bar mdzad pas na 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi gzugs kyi shes bya rnams la khyab cing gsal bar mdzad pas na 'bar ba'o //
translated: He is blazing because he pervades and illuminates all objects of intuition with the form of intuition.

original: dpal gyi be'u'i gzugs kyis gnas pas na dpal gyi be'u'o //
analyzed: dpal gyi be'u'i gzugs kyis gnas pas na dpal gyi be'u'o //
translated: He is the auspicious mark because he abides in the form of the auspicious mark.

original: lag na 'od 'bar bas na 'od 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: lag na 'od 'bar bas na 'od 'bar ba ste /
translated: He is radiant because his hands are radiant.

original: lag pa 'od 'bar bas gsal bar byed pas na lag na 'od 'bar ro //
analyzed: lag pa 'od 'bar bas gsal bar byed pas na lag na 'od 'bar ro //
translated: He is a torch-bearer because he illuminates with his radiant hand.

original: ye shes kyi tshul gyis snang bar byed pas na snang ba po'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshul gyis snang bar byed pas na snang ba po'o //
translated: He is a light because he illuminates with the method of intuition.

original: dam pa'i chos kyi sman gyis nyon mongs pa'i nad gso bar mdzad pas na sman pa che mchog go //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi sman gyis nyon mongs pa'i nad gso bar mdzad pas na sman pa che mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme physician because he cures the disease of the addictions with the medicine of the holy Dharma.

original: de nyid kyis na gtso bo ste'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na gtso bo ste'o //
translated: He is the chief because of that.

original: thog ma med pa'i skye ba'i zug rdu rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'byin pas na zug rdu 'byin pa bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i skye ba'i zug rdu rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'byin pas na zug rdu 'byin pa bla na med pa'o //
translated: He is the unexcelled extractor of splinters because he extracts the splinters of beginningless birth together with their roots.

original: sman ma lus pa ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas dang chos kyis bsgrubs shing bskyed pa'i shing yin pas na sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ngo //
analyzed: sman ma lus pa ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas dang chos kyis bsgrubs shing bskyed pa'i shing yin pas na sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ngo //
translated: He is the tree of all medicines because he is the tree which grows and develops all medicines, the essence of the Dharma and the essence of the Buddha.

original: nyon mongs pa'i nad rtsa ba nas 'byin pas na nad do cog gi dgra che ba ste /
