analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i nad rtsa ba nas 'byin pas na nad do cog gi dgra che ba ste /
translated: He is the great enemy of all diseases because he eradicates the disease of the addictions from the root.

original: gnyen por gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyen por gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúantidote‚Äù is the same as ‚Äúenemy.‚Äù

original: thams cad kyi 'dod par bya ba yin pas na sdu gu'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'dod par bya ba yin pas na sdu gu'o //
translated: He is the lovely one because he is the desire of all.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi dpral bar gyur pas na 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog go //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi dpral bar gyur pas na 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog go //
translated: He is the best of the three worlds, because he is the forehead of the three worlds.

original: gang la ye shes mtshan nyid can gyi dpal yod pa de ni dpal ldan no //
analyzed: gang la ye shes mtshan nyid can gyi dpal yod pa de ni dpal ldan no //
translated: He is glorious, because he has glory, which is characterized by intuition.

original: ji ltar skar ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na zla ba mdzes pa de @20a * //
analyzed: ji ltar skar ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na zla ba mdzes pa de @20a * //
translated: Just as the moon is beautiful in the midst of the circle of stars,

original: bzhin du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na mdzes pas na rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can no //
analyzed: bzhin du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na mdzes pas na rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can no //
translated: so he is beautiful in the midst of the circle of disciples.

original: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa rnams su chos kyi rgyal mtshan shin tu mthon po sgreng bar mdzad pas na /üîΩphyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs par //
analyzed: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa rnams su chos kyi rgyal mtshan shin tu mthon po sgreng bar mdzad pas na / phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs par //
translated: He is the one who has raised the banner of the Dharma in the ten directions to the limits of space,üîΩso it is said:

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
translated: He has well planted the banner of the DharmaüîΩin the ten directions to the limits of space.

original: zhes bya'o // char dang tsha ba'i gdung ba nye bar bzlog pa'i phyir dang / 'gro ba rnams la khyab pa'i gdugs gcig pu'i bdag nyid can pas na 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pas te'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // char dang tsha ba'i gdung ba nye bar bzlog pa'i phyir dang / 'gro ba rnams la khyab pa'i gdugs gcig pu'i bdag nyid can pas na 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pas te'o //
translated: He is the one with the vast parasol of the world, because he is the one who has the sole parasol that covers the world, in order to ward off the afflictions of heat and rain.

original: byams pa dang snying rje dag gis yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'gebs pas na byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can no //üîΩye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
analyzed: byams pa dang snying rje dag gis yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'gebs pas na byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can no // ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
translated: It is the mandala of love and compassion because it is covered by the manner of being surrounded by love and compassion.üîΩIt is glorious because it is endowed with the lordship of intuition.üîΩ

original: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pas na padma gar gyi bdag go //
analyzed: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pas na padma gar gyi bdag go //
translated: He is the lord of the lotus dance, because he holds the form of the lord of the lotus dance.

original: thams cad du khyab pas na khyab bdag chen po'o //
analyzed: thams cad du khyab pas na khyab bdag chen po'o //
translated: He is the great lord, because he pervades everywhere.

original: rin po ches nye bar mdzes pa'i gdugs gang la yod pa de ni rin chen gdugs so //
analyzed: rin po ches nye bar mdzes pa'i gdugs gang la yod pa de ni rin chen gdugs so //
translated: He is the precious parasol, because he has a parasol which is beautified by jewels.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbus na mdzes pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbus na mdzes pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che'o //
translated: He is the great splendor of all the buddhas, because he is beautiful in the midst of all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad sku'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo 'chang bar mdzad pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad sku'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo 'chang bar mdzad pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the holder of the body of all the buddhas, because he holds the essence of the nature of the body of all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che'o //
translated: He is the great yoga of all the buddhas, because he possesses the great yoga of all the buddhas.

original: de'i bka' bzhin byed bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gcig pa'i tshul gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig go //
analyzed: de'i bka' bzhin byed bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gcig pa'i tshul gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig go //
translated: Since he acts in accordance with that, he is the one teaching of all buddhas.

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che ni rdo rje rin chen no //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che ni rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: The jewel marked with a vajra is the vajra jewel.

original: des dbang bskur bas khams gsum gyi bdag po'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal lo //
analyzed: des dbang bskur bas khams gsum gyi bdag po'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal lo //
translated: Since he is consecrated by that, he is the one who has the glory of the consecration of the vajra jewel.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs la brten pa'i bdag po'i dbang phyug yin pas rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs la brten pa'i bdag po'i dbang phyug yin pas rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste'o //
translated: He is the lord of all jewels, since he is the lord of the jewel lineage.

original: 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag go //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag go //
translated: He is the lord of all lords of the world, since he is the lord of all lords of the world.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje'o //
translated: He is the lord of all vajra holders, since he is the lord of all vajra holders.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang gnyis su med pa'i thugs nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang gnyis su med pa'i thugs nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba'o //
translated: The great mind of all the Buddhas is the mind of all the Buddhas, which is the nature of Ratnasa·πÉbhava, AmitƒÅbha, and Ak·π£obhya, and is the mind of all the Buddhas, which is nondual with the mind of all the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: The one who abides in the mind of all the Buddhas is the one who abides in the mind of all the Buddhas.

original: @20b sangs rgyas thams cad kye sku mnga' ba de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba'o //
analyzed: @20b sangs rgyas thams cad kye sku mnga' ba de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba'o //
translated: The great body of all the Buddhas is the body of all the Buddhas.

original: gang gi gsung sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung yang yin no //üîΩnyi ma dang 'dra bar byed pas mi shes pa'i mun nag sel bar mdzad pas na rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che'o //
analyzed: gang gi gsung sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung yang yin no // nyi ma dang 'dra bar byed pas mi shes pa'i mun nag sel bar mdzad pas na rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che'o //
translated: The speech of all the Buddhas is the speech of all the Buddhas.üîΩThe great light of the vajra sun is the vajra sun, which dispels the darkness of ignorance like the sun.

original: nyon mongs ba'i gdung bsel bar byed pa dang dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pas na rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od do //
analyzed: nyon mongs ba'i gdung bsel bar byed pa dang dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pas na rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od do //
translated: The stainless light of the vajra moon is the vajra moon, which dispels the torment of afflictions and possesses stainless light.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pa spong ba dang ldan pas na chags bral la sogs so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pa spong ba dang ldan pas na chags bral la sogs so //
translated: He is free from attachment, etc., because he is endowed with the abandonment of attachment, etc.

original: thugs rje chen po'i chags pa dang ldan pas na chags pa che'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i chags pa dang ldan pas na chags pa che'o //
translated: He is greatly attached because he is attached to great compassion.

original: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su yang dag par ston pas na kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od do //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su yang dag par ston pas na kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od do //
translated: He is the light of the blazing multicolored light because he manifests in various forms.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i skyil krung chang bas rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje'i skyil krung chang bas rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
translated: He is the perfect Buddha's vajra posture because he is the perfect Buddha in the vajra posture.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro ba ni yang dag par 'dus nas chos kyi 'gro ba mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro ba ni yang dag par 'dus nas chos kyi 'gro ba mdzad pa'o //
translated: The going of the Buddhas is the going of the Dharma after gathering correctly.

original: de 'dzin pas na sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa'o ;
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa'o ;
translated: He is the holder of the Dharma of the Buddhas' going because he holds that.

original: / gang la dpal yod pa de ni dpal ldan no //
analyzed: / gang la dpal yod pa de ni dpal ldan no //
translated: He is glorious because he has glory.

original: sangs rgyas kyi padmas bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas padma skyes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi padmas bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas padma skyes so //
translated: He is the Buddha born from the lotus because he is born from the Buddha's lotus.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni mdzod do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni mdzod do //
translated: The treasure is the wisdom of omniscience.

original: de 'dzin pas na kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is the holder of the treasury of omniscient wisdom because he holds it.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the king because he is the lord of all buddhas.

original: med pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs yod pa'i ngo bor ston pas na sgyu 'phrul te /
analyzed: med pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs yod pa'i ngo bor ston pas na sgyu 'phrul te /
translated: He is the illusion because he reveals the nature of non-existence as the nature of existence.

original: de thugs la 'jog par mdzad pas na sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: de thugs la 'jog par mdzad pas na sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the holder of various illusions because he holds them in his mind.

original: mchod par 'os pas na che ba'o //
analyzed: mchod par 'os pas na che ba'o //
translated: He is the great one because he is worthy of worship.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rig sngags ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rig sngags ni shes rab bo //
translated: The knowledge-mantra of the buddhas is wisdom.

original: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the holder of the buddhas' knowledge-mantra because he holds it.

original: chos thams cad bdag med par so sor thugs su chud pas na rdo rje rnon po'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med par so sor thugs su chud pas na rdo rje rnon po'o //
translated: He is the sharp vajra because he individually realizes the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: nyon mongs ba'i ljon shing gcod pas na ral gri che'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs ba'i ljon shing gcod pas na ral gri che'o //
translated: He is the great sword because he cuts down the tree of afflictions.

original: yi ge mchog ni aa yis brjod pa de 'dzin pas na yi ge mchog go //
analyzed: yi ge mchog ni aa yis brjod pa de 'dzin pas na yi ge mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme syllable because he holds the supreme syllable A.

original: mi bden pa'i dri ma'i rnam par rtog pa med pas na rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mi bden pa'i dri ma'i rnam par rtog pa med pas na rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: He is the pure one because he is free from the conceptual thoughts of unreal stains.

original: theg pa chen po'i lam gyis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcod pas na theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i lam gyis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcod pas na theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod do //
translated: The Great Vehicle is the Great Vehicle because it cuts off the suffering of cyclic existence by means of the path of the Great Vehicle.

original: rdo rje'i chos ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i chos ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The vajra Dharma is the nondual intuition.

original: rdo rje chos kyi mtshon cha chen po de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcod pas na mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyi mtshon cha chen po de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcod pas na mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos so //
translated: The great weapon of the vajra Dharma is the Great Weapon, the vajra Dharma, because it cuts off the conceptualization of subject and object.

original: mi phyed cing zab pa ston @21a * //
analyzed: mi phyed cing zab pa ston @21a * //
translated: The Great Vehicle teaches the indivisible and profound Dharma,

original: pa'i theg pa chen pos nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik go //
analyzed: pa'i theg pa chen pos nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik go //
translated: and that which is the vehicle of the hearers and solitary enlightened ones is the profound vajra, the vajra holder.

original: bdud rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i blo dang ldan pas na rdo rje blo gros so //
analyzed: bdud rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i blo dang ldan pas na rdo rje blo gros so //
translated: The vajra mind is so called because it possesses the mind that is indivisible even by the demons.

original: mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po thams cad kyi don mkhyen pas na don bzhin rig go //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po thams cad kyi don mkhyen pas na don bzhin rig go //
translated: The one who knows the meaning of all things by means of impermanence and so on is the one who knows the meaning as it is.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa mnga' bas na pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa mnga' bas na pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The one who is perfected in all perfections is the one who is perfected in all perfections.

original: sa bcu'i rgyan dang ldan pa de ni sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sa bcu'i rgyan dang ldan pa de ni sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with the ornaments of the ten stages, and so is adorned with the ornaments of all the stages.

original: rnam par dag pa'i chos bdag med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pas na rnam par dag pa bdag med chos so //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i chos bdag med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pas na rnam par dag pa bdag med chos so //
translated: He is the pure Dharma, the selflessness of things, because he has realized the gnosis of that.

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid zla ba ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid zla ba ste /
translated: The true gnosis itself is the moon.

original: de'i 'od kyis log pa'i shes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i sems dri ma med par mdzes pas na yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang ngo //
analyzed: de'i 'od kyis log pa'i shes pa'i mun nag gis khebs pa'i sems dri ma med par mdzes pas na yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang ngo //
translated: Because the stainless mind, which is covered by the darkness of false knowledge, is beautified by its light, he is the one with the good light of the moon of true gnosis.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi don ston pa'i brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste'o //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi don ston pa'i brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste'o //
translated: He is the great diligence who teaches the meaning of the Net of Illusory Emanations Tantra.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyud thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa des na rgyud kun gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa des na rgyud kun gyi bdag po'o //
translated: He is the lord of all the tantras, and so is the lord of all the tantras.

original: de nyid kyis na dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: And because he is the best, he is the supreme.

original: ma lus pa'i rnam pa las rgyal ba'i phyir rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan no //
analyzed: ma lus pa'i rnam pa las rgyal ba'i phyir rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan no //
translated: He is the vajra seat, since he is seated in the vajra posture, which is victorious over all forms.

original: bya ba byas pas phung po'i bdag nyid can longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku mnga' bas na ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang ngo //
analyzed: bya ba byas pas phung po'i bdag nyid can longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku mnga' bas na ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the holder of all the bodies of intuition, since he has the beatific and emanation bodies, which are the nature of the aggregates, having done what was to be done.

original: thams cad du bzang bas na kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: thams cad du bzang bas na kun du bzang po'o //
translated: He is Samantabhadra, since he is good in all ways.

original: blo gros shin tu bzang po dang ldan pas na blo gros bzang ngo //
analyzed: blo gros shin tu bzang po dang ldan pas na blo gros bzang ngo //
translated: He is Manjusri, since he has extremely good intelligence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i gzugs 'dzin pas na sa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i gzugs 'dzin pas na sa'i snying po'o //
translated: He is Kshitigarbha, since he holds the form of the Bodhisattva Kshitigarbha.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa'i gnas su gyur pas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa'i gnas su gyur pas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is Jagad-dhara, since he is the support of the world.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che'o //
translated: He is the great essence of all the Buddhas, since he is the cause of the generation of all the Buddhas.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The various emanation wheels are the wheel of the mandala.

original: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the bearer of the various emanation wheels because he holds them.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
translated: The nature of all things is essencelessness.

original: de nyid kyis na rang bzhin gyi mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rang bzhin gyi mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: He is the supreme nature because of that.

original: de nyid kyis na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin no //
translated: He is the bearer of the nature of all things because of that.

original: skye ba med pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni skye med chos te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni skye med chos te /
translated: The Dharma that is non-arisen is the non-arisen Dharma.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i don ston pas na chos kyi don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i don ston pas na chos kyi don to //
translated: The Dharma that is essenceless is the Dharma meaning because it teaches the meaning of non-arisen.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of all Dharmas is the nature of emptiness.

original: @21b de 'dzin pas na chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: @21b de 'dzin pas na chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the bearer of the nature of all Dharmas because he holds that.

original: shes rab chen pos skad cig ma la chos thams cad thugs su chud pas na shes rab chen pas skad cig la'o //
analyzed: shes rab chen pos skad cig ma la chos thams cad thugs su chud pas na shes rab chen pas skad cig la'o //
translated: He is the one with great wisdom in an instant because he comprehends all Dharmas in an instant with great wisdom.

original: chos thams cad mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis thugs su chud pa thugs la 'dzin pas na chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis thugs su chud pa thugs la 'dzin pas na chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the bearer of the realization of all things, because he bears in mind the realization of all things in the manner of impermanence, etc.

original: chos thams cad ni 'dus byas la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni 'dus byas la sogs pa ste /
translated: All things are compounded, etc.

original: de mngon par rtogs shing thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste'o //
analyzed: de mngon par rtogs shing thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste'o //
translated: The realization and understanding of that is the realization of all things.

original: shes rab mchog tu gyur pas na thub pa blo mchog go //
analyzed: shes rab mchog tu gyur pas na thub pa blo mchog go //
translated: He is the Sage, the best of the wise, because of his preeminent wisdom.

original: 'byung po ni bden pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'byung po ni bden pa'i don to //
translated: Bh≈´ta means truth.

original: de'i mtha' ni mthar thug pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i mtha' ni mthar thug pa nyid de /
translated: The end of that is its finality.

original: de thugs su chud pas na 'byung po'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de thugs su chud pas na 'byung po'i mtha'o //
translated: He is the knower of the end of bh≈´tas, because he has realized that.

original: gnas ngan len gyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas mi 'gyur bas na mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: gnas ngan len gyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas mi 'gyur bas na mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: He is the unshakable one, because he is unchangeable, being free from all conceptual thoughts of evil.

original: ma reg pa dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bas na rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: ma reg pa dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnyog pa dang bral bas na rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: He is the one with the nature of clear faith, because he is free from the turbidity of contact, passion, etc.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o //
translated: The enlightenment of perfect buddhahood is the knowledge of destruction and non-arising.

original: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the bearer of the enlightenment of perfect buddhahood because he holds it.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su chud pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su chud pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa'o //
translated: He is the direct perceiver of all buddhas because he is the very essence of the expanse of reality, which is realized by all buddhas.

original: ye shes kyi me lce yin pa de ni ye shes kyi me lce'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi me lce yin pa de ni ye shes kyi me lce'o //
translated: The flame of knowledge is the flame of wisdom.

original: shin tu bzang po'i 'od dang ldan pas na 'od 'bar gsal lo //
analyzed: shin tu bzang po'i 'od dang ldan pas na 'od 'bar gsal lo //
translated: He is the radiant light because he possesses the light of the most excellent.

original: 'dod pa ni dgos pa ste sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni dgos pa ste sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: The aim is the goal, which is buddhahood.

original: de'i don grub pas na 'dod pa'i don grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don grub pas na 'dod pa'i don grub pa'o //
translated: He is the fulfiller of the aim because he accomplishes that aim.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid pas na dam pa ste'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid pas na dam pa ste'o //
translated: He is the highest because he is supramundane.

original: ngan 'gro ngan song thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzad pas na ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: ngan 'gro ngan song thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzad pas na ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba'o //
translated: He is the purifier of all evil destinies because he pacifies all evil destinies.

original: ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na mgon po'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na mgon po'o //
translated: He is the protector because he possesses the sovereignty of wisdom.

original: nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad dang bral bas na sems can kun gyi mchog go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad dang bral bas na sems can kun gyi mchog go //
translated: He is the best of all beings because he is free from all the bonds of the afflictions.

original: thabs la mkhas pa thams cad kyi stobs kyis sems can thams cad rab tu grol bar mdzad pas na sems can thams cad rab grol byed do //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa thams cad kyi stobs kyis sems can thams cad rab tu grol bar mdzad pas na sems can thams cad rab grol byed do //
translated: He is the liberator of all beings because he liberates all beings by the power of all skillful means.üîΩThe afflictions are desire and so on.

original: nyon mongs pa de ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //üîΩde dang lhan cig g-yul sprod pas na nyon mongs g-yul lo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa de ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o // de dang lhan cig g-yul sprod pas na nyon mongs g-yul lo //
translated: The battle with them is the battle with the afflictions.

original: der ni gcig pu dpa' bo yin gyi gzhan ma yin pas na gcig dpa' ba'o //
analyzed: der ni gcig pu dpa' bo yin gyi gzhan ma yin pas na gcig dpa' ba'o //
translated: He is the hero in that battle because he is the only hero there, not anyone else.

original: mi shes pa'i dgra'i dregs pa ni phyi rol gyi don la mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: mi shes pa'i dgra'i dregs pa ni phyi rol gyi don la mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: The pride of the enemy, ignorance, is the adherence to external objects.

original: de spangs pas na mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: de spangs pas na mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms pa'o //
translated: He is the destroyer of the pride of the enemy, ignorance, because he abandons it.

original: ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
translated: He is glorious because he possesses the sovereignty of intuition.
He is the lord of the world because he is the lord of the three worlds.

original: rten las 'das pa'i blo ste /üîΩde dang ldan pa'i steg cing sgeg pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rten las 'das pa'i blo ste /üîΩde dang ldan pa'i steg cing sgeg pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is the one with the transcendent intellect because he has the intellect that transcends the world.üîΩHe is the one with the transcendent intellect because he has the intellect that intellect that transcends the world

original: brtan po'i nyams dang ldan pa la brten cing bdud la sogs pa'i dgra bzlog pas na brtan po'i gzugs 'chang ba'i //
analyzed: brtan po'i nyams dang ldan pa la brten cing bdud la sogs pa'i dgra bzlog pas na brtan po'i gzugs 'chang ba'i //
translated: He is the bearer of a firm form because he is based on the experience of firmness and because he wards off enemies such as Mara.

original: shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs 'dzin pas na mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs 'dzin pas na mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the bearer of an ugly form because he assumes a very terrible form.

original: mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'i lag pa'i mchog brgya po bskyod cing sna tshogs su 'jog pa'i rkang pa brgya snyed kyis bskyod pa'i gar mdzad pas na //
analyzed: mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'i lag pa'i mchog brgya po bskyod cing sna tshogs su 'jog pa'i rkang pa brgya snyed kyis bskyod pa'i gar mdzad pas na //
translated: He is the dancer with a hundred hands holding various weapons and a hundred feet moving in various ways.

original: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
analyzed: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
translated: He is the one who moves all his hundred hands

original: gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa //
analyzed: gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa //
translated: and dances with the gait of a goose.

original: zhes bya'o // dpal dang ldan pa'i lag pa brgyas khyab pas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par gar mdzad pas na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dpal dang ldan pa'i lag pa brgyas khyab pas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par gar mdzad pas na /
translated: He is the one who dances to the limits of the realm of space, pervading it with his glorious hundred hands.üîΩHe is the one who dances, pervading the sky

original: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //üîΩnam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
analyzed: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la // nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
translated: with his glorious hundred hands.

original: zhes bya'o // sa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi ni sa'i cha'i steng ste /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // sa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi ni sa'i cha'i steng ste /
translated: The ground of the earth mandala is the surface of the earth.

original: de'i khyon de la rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil gyis mnan nas bzhugs pas na /
analyzed: de'i khyon de la rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil gyis mnan nas bzhugs pas na /
translated: He stands on the surface of that with the sole of one foot.

original: sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon //
analyzed: sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon //
translated: The extent of the surface of the earth

original: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
analyzed: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
translated: is pressed down by the sole of one foot.

original: zhes bya'o // gang gis rkang pa'i mthe bong gi sen mo'i khyon gyis tshangs pa'i yul sa'i steng gi cha gnon pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // gang gis rkang pa'i mthe bong gi sen mo'i khyon gyis tshangs pa'i yul sa'i steng gi cha gnon pa ste /
translated: He presses down with the tip of the nail of his big toe the highest part of the Brahma world.

original: rkang mtheb kyi sen mos tshangs pa'i yul sa dang bcas pa'i rtse mo mnan nas der bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rkang mtheb kyi sen mos tshangs pa'i yul sa dang bcas pa'i rtse mo mnan nas der bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: He stands there.

original: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
analyzed: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
translated: The tip of the nail of his big toe

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
translated: presses down on the highest part of the Brahma world.

original: zhes bya'o // don gcig pa nyid ni 'di lta ste //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // don gcig pa nyid ni 'di lta ste //
translated: The same meaning is also expressed in this way:

original: gnyis su med pa'i don nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i don nyid do //
translated: The meaning of non-duality.

original: gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dang bral ba gnyis su med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi don dam pa yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dang bral ba gnyis su med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi don dam pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of non-dual ultimate reality is free from the duality of object and subject.

original: de ni nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas 'jig pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de ni nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas 'jig pa med pa'o //
translated: Since it never changes into anything else, it is indestructible.

original: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i don so sor snang ba yod pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rig pa skye bar 'gyur bas rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i don so sor snang ba yod pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rig pa skye bar 'gyur bas rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can no //
translated: The various cognitions arise because of the appearance of individual objects such as external form, etc. Therefore, the various cognitions have the meaning of form.

original: sems nyid rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: sems nyid rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: The mind itself is consciousness.

original: de'i rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pas na sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan no //
analyzed: de'i rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pas na sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan no //
translated: Since its continuum is uninterrupted, the mind and consciousness have a continuum.

original: dngos po'i don ma lus pa rnams la sems pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad nas dga' ba bskyed pas na dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i don ma lus pa rnams la sems pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad nas dga' ba bskyed pas na dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'o //
translated: Since one generates joy by investigating all things with the wisdom of the nature of mind, one delights in all things.

original: stong pa nyid kyi don la shin tu dga' ba skyes pas na stong pa nyid dga'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi don la shin tu dga' ba skyes pas na stong pa nyid dga'o //
translated: Since one generates great joy in the meaning of emptiness, one delights in emptiness.

original: de nyid kyis na shes rab kyi mchog yin pas na blo'i mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na shes rab kyi mchog yin pas na blo'i mchog go //
translated: Since one is supreme wisdom by that very fact, one is supreme mind.

original: srid pa la chags pas na srid pa'i 'dod chags so //
analyzed: srid pa la chags pas na srid pa'i 'dod chags so //
translated: Since one is attached to existence, one is attached to existence.

original: srid pa'i 'dod @22b chags la sogs pa las 'das pas na srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dod @22b chags la sogs pa las 'das pas na srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa'o //
translated: Since one transcends attachment to existence, etc., one abandons attachment to existence, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags las 'das pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù refers to the transcendence of the desire realm.

original: gzhan sems can gyi don gyi dbang gis srid pa gsum la dga' ba gang la yod pa de ni srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan sems can gyi don gyi dbang gis srid pa gsum la dga' ba gang la yod pa de ni srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa'o //
translated: The one who has great delight in the three realms of existence out of his desire to benefit other sentient beings is the one who has great delight in the three realms.

original: sprin dkar po ltar dkar bas na sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar ro //
analyzed: sprin dkar po ltar dkar bas na sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar ro //
translated: He is as white as a white cloud, thus he is white like a pure white cloud.

original: kha dog thams cad med pas na dag pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog thams cad med pas na dag pa'o //
translated: He is pure because he is devoid of all colors.

original: de nyid kyis na 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od de //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od de //
translated: His light is like the light of the autumn moon.

original: 'od shin tu bzang po dang ldan pas 'od bzang ngo //
analyzed: 'od shin tu bzang po dang ldan pas 'od bzang ngo //
translated: He has an excellent light because he possesses a very excellent light.

original: 'char ma thag pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od ltar dmar bas na nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes so //
analyzed: 'char ma thag pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od ltar dmar bas na nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes so //
translated: He is beautiful like the orb of the rising sun because he is red like the orb of the rising sun.

original: sen mo'i 'od shin tu dmar ba dang ldan pas na sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar ro //
analyzed: sen mo'i 'od shin tu dmar ba dang ldan pas na sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar ro //
translated: He has a very red light on his nails because he possesses a very red light on his nails.

original: cod pan nor bu mthon ka'i rtse mo ltar mdzes pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse'o //
analyzed: cod pan nor bu mthon ka'i rtse mo ltar mdzes pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse'o //
translated: He has an excellent crown protuberance because he has an excellent crown protuberance that is beautiful like the peak of a precious jewel.

original: skra'i rtse mo mthon ka chen po dang 'dra ba mnga' bas na skra mchog mthon ka chen po can no //
analyzed: skra'i rtse mo mthon ka chen po dang 'dra ba mnga' bas na skra mchog mthon ka chen po can no //
translated: He has the best of hair, which is like a great sapphire, thus he is the one with the best of hair, the great sapphire.

original: nor bu chen po'i 'od dang ldan pa'i dpal gang la yod pa de ni nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal lo //
analyzed: nor bu chen po'i 'od dang ldan pa'i dpal gang la yod pa de ni nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal lo //
translated: He has the glory of the light of a great jewel, thus he is the one with the glory of the light of a great jewel.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas brgyan pas na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas brgyan pas na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan no //
translated: He is adorned with the emanations of the Buddhas, like the perfection of wisdom, thus he is the one adorned with the emanations of the Buddhas.

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i gom pa'i stobs che ba 'dor bas 'jig rten gyi khams brgya g-yo bar mdzad pas na 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i gom pa'i stobs che ba 'dor bas 'jig rten gyi khams brgya g-yo bar mdzad pas na 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa'o //
translated: He shakes a hundred world systems with the great power of his steps, thus he is the one who shakes a hundred world systems.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
translated: He has the great power of the bases of magical power.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: rdzu 'phrul nyid kyi rkang pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul nyid kyi rkang pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan no //
translated: he has the great power of the bases of magical power, thus he is the one with the great power of the bases of magical power.

original: de kho na nyid la gnas pas na de nyid do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid la gnas pas na de nyid do //
translated: He abides in reality, thus he is the one who abides in reality.

original: sngon nyams su myong ba brjed par mi 'gyur bas na dran pa chen po 'chang ngo //
analyzed: sngon nyams su myong ba brjed par mi 'gyur bas na dran pa chen po 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the great memory, because he does not forget the experience of the past.

original: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa ste /üîΩrjes su dran pa bzhi po de nyid ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa ste / rjes su dran pa bzhi po de nyid ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: He is the four recollections, because he recollects the Buddha, the Dharma, the Sa·πÖgha, and giving.üîΩHe is the concentration of the four recollections, because those four recollections are themselves concentrations.

original: de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pas na dran pa bzhi po ting nge 'dzin rgyal lo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pas na dran pa bzhi po ting nge 'dzin rgyal lo //
translated: He is the concentration king of the four recollections, because he is the lord of those.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog gi dri dang ldan pa'i gzugs can yin pas na byang chub yan lag me tog spos so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog gi dri dang ldan pa'i gzugs can yin pas na byang chub yan lag me tog spos so //
translated: He is the flower incense of the branches of enlightenment, because he has the form of the fragrance of the flowers of the branches of enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i bzhir gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i bzhir gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho'o //
translated: He is the ocean of the qualities of the TathƒÅgatas, because he is the jewel mine of the qualities of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: lam gyi yan lag brgyad nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang / thun mong gi tshul gyis yongs su mkhyen pas na lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig go //
analyzed: lam gyi yan lag brgyad nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang / thun mong gi tshul gyis yongs su mkhyen pas na lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig go //
translated: He is the knower of the eightfold path, because he fully knows the eightfold path by the method common to the ≈õrƒÅvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and so on.

original: @23a * // de nyid kyis na yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa'o //
analyzed: @23a * // de nyid kyis na yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa'o //
translated: Therefore, he is the one who knows the path to perfect buddhahood.

original: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kun la shas cher chags pas na sems can kun la shas cher chags pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kun la shas cher chags pas na sems can kun la shas cher chags pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is greatly attached to all sentient beings, because of his great compassion.

original: shes rab kyi de kho na nyid la brten pas na nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi de kho na nyid la brten pas na nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is unattached like space, because he is based on the reality of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad kyi yid la 'jug cing shes pas sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi yid la 'jug cing shes pas sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug pa'o //
translated: He is the one who enters the minds of all sentient beings, because he knows and penetrates the minds of all sentient beings.

original: de nyid kyis na yid mgyogs pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa gtong bas na sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na yid mgyogs pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa gtong bas na sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs so //
translated: He is the one who is swift like the mind, because he sends forth the verses of Dharma to all sentient beings with a swift mind.

original: tha ma dang / 'bring dang / mchog gi sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i don yongs su mkhyen pas na sems can kun gyi dbang don shes so //
analyzed: tha ma dang / 'bring dang / mchog gi sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i don yongs su mkhyen pas na sems can kun gyi dbang don shes so //
translated: He is the one who knows the faculties and aims of all sentient beings, because he knows the faculties and aims of all sentient beings, whether inferior, middling, or superior.

original: shin tu yid du 'ong zhing dga' bas sems can thams cad kyi yid 'phrog pas na sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu yid du 'ong zhing dga' bas sems can thams cad kyi yid 'phrog pas na sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa'o //
translated: He is the ravisher of the minds of all beings, because he is very attractive and delightful, and he captivates the minds of all beings.

original: gzugs ni dbu ba lta bu ste //
analyzed: gzugs ni dbu ba lta bu ste //
translated: Form is like foam,

original: tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
analyzed: tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
translated: Feeling is like bubbles,

original: 'du shes smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: 'du shes smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
translated: Perception is like a mirage,

original: 'du byed rnams ni chu shing 'dra //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni chu shing 'dra //
translated: Formations are like a plantain tree,

original: rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: And consciousness is like an illusion.

original: zhes phung po bstan pa'i tshul gyis ston pa 'dis phung po lnga don gyi de kho na nyid mkhyen pas na phung po lnga don de nyid shes so //
analyzed: zhes phung po bstan pa'i tshul gyis ston pa 'dis phung po lnga don gyi de kho na nyid mkhyen pas na phung po lnga don de nyid shes so //
translated: By this teaching in the manner of the aggregates, he knows the reality of the five aggregates, thus he knows the reality of the five aggregates.

original: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ste /
translated: Morality, concentration, wisdom, liberation, and the vision of the wisdom of liberation.

original: du nga po lnga po rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin pas na rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: du nga po lnga po rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin pas na rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the bearer of the five pure aggregates, because he holds the nature of the five pure aggregates.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i mthar thug pa la zhugs pas na nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas so //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i mthar thug pa la zhugs pas na nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas so //
translated: He is the one who stands at the end of all the paths of deliverance, because he has entered the final deliverance of the Sravakas, etc.

original: nges par 'byung ba thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo thugs su chud pas na nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo thugs su chud pas na nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is skilled in all the paths of deliverance, because he has realized the nature of all the paths of deliverance.

original: nges par 'byung ba thams cad la zhugs pas na sems can rnams lam de la 'jog pas na nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas so //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba thams cad la zhugs pas na sems can rnams lam de la 'jog pas na nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas so //
translated: He is the one who stands on the path of all the paths of deliverance, because he has entered all the paths of deliverance and because he establishes beings in those paths.

original: sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba thams cad ston pas na nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba thams cad ston pas na nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa'o //
translated: He is the one who teaches all the paths of deliverance, because he teaches all the paths of deliverance to beings.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyi mtshan nyid can gyi srid par 'jug pa rtsa ba dang bcas pa yang bton pas na yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton pa'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyi mtshan nyid can gyi srid par 'jug pa rtsa ba dang bcas pa yang bton pas na yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has uprooted the twelve branches and the craving that is their root, because he has uprooted the entry into existence which has the twelve branches of dependent origination for its characteristic and the craving that is their root.

original: de nyid kyis na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag rnam pa bcu gnyis can med pa rnam par dag pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pas na dag pa rnam pa bcu @23b gnyis 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag rnam pa bcu gnyis can med pa rnam par dag pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pas na dag pa rnam pa bcu @23b gnyis 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the holder of the twelve purities because he attains the pure nirvana which is the nonexistence of the twelve members of dependent origination.

original: sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa ston pas na bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can no //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa ston pas na bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can no //
translated: He is the one who shows the aspects of the four noble truths because he shows the aspects of the four noble truths of suffering, origin, cessation, and path.

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la sogs pa'i shes pa brgyad ni shes pa brgyad po ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la sogs pa'i shes pa brgyad ni shes pa brgyad po ste /
translated: The eight knowledges are the eight knowledges of the knowledge of the dharma with regard to suffering, etc.

original: shes pa de rnams thugs su chud cing de rnams nyid thugs la 'jog pas na shes pa brgyad po rtog pa 'chang ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de rnams thugs su chud cing de rnams nyid thugs la 'jog pas na shes pa brgyad po rtog pa 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the one who holds the eight knowledges because he has those knowledges and he places them in the mind.

original: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i don ston pas na bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan no //
analyzed: skye mched bcu gnyis kyi rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i don ston pas na bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan no //
translated: He is the one who possesses the twelve aspects of the meaning of the truths because he teaches the meaning of the conventional truth which has the characteristic of the aspects of the twelve sense bases.

original: de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni nang stong pa nyid nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni nang stong pa nyid nas brtsams te /
translated: The sixteen aspects of thatness are as follows.üîΩ

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid bcu drug go //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid bcu drug go //
translated: The sixteen aspects of thatness are the sixteen kinds of emptiness, beginning with the emptiness of the external and ending with the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de rnams ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pas na de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig go //
analyzed: de rnams ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pas na de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig go //
translated: Since he knows them as they are, he is aware of the sixteen aspects of thatness.

original: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes bcu drug gi rnam pa la gzhan yang me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes bcu drug gi rnam pa la gzhan yang me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa ste /
translated: The sixteen aspects of the gnosis of thatness are also the four aspects of the mirror-like gnosis, the equality gnosis, the individual realization gnosis and the accomplishing gnosis.

original: rnam pa bzhi bsnan pa ni rnam pa nyi shu ste ;
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi bsnan pa ni rnam pa nyi shu ste ;
translated: Adding these four aspects to the previous sixteen makes twenty aspects.

original: de lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub pa'o //
translated: He is enlightened in this way.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rnam pas byang chub pas na rnam pa sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rnam pas byang chub pas na rnam pa sangs rgyas so //
translated: He is the Buddha because he is enlightened with various aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na kun rig go //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na kun rig go //
translated: He is omniscient because he possesses the gnosis of omniscience.

original: thams cad kyi dam pa yin pas na mchog go //
analyzed: thams cad kyi dam pa yin pas na mchog go //
translated: He is supreme because he is the best of all.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par sems can gyi don la cig car 'jug pas na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par sems can gyi don la cig car 'jug pas na /
translated: The emanations of the infinite buddhas in the infinite buddha bodies simultaneously engage in the welfare of sentient beings in infinite world systems.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
translated: The emanation body of all buddhas

original: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po'o //
analyzed: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po'o //
translated: is the one who radiates infinite millions of emanations.

original: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ni dus kyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ste de mkhyen pas na skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ni dus kyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ste de mkhyen pas na skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The realization of all moments is the thorough knowledge of the characteristics of time.

original: sems can thams cad dang 'brel pa'i sems mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa dang log pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dang 'brel pa'i sems mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa dang log pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The characteristic of the mind connected with all sentient beings is the characteristic of the correct and the incorrect.

original: de mkhyen pas sems kyi skad cig kun rig go //
analyzed: de mkhyen pas sems kyi skad cig kun rig go //
translated: Because he knows that, he is the one who knows all the moments of mind.

original: theg pa sna tshogs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The various vehicles are the vehicle of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so on.

original: de nyid thabs te /
analyzed: de nyid thabs te /
translated: That itself is the method.

original: theg pa sna tshogs pa'i thabs des 'gro ba rnams kyi don la rnam par rtog cing rdzogs par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs pa'i thabs des 'gro ba rnams kyi don la rnam par rtog cing rdzogs par mdzad pas na /
translated: Because he thinks about and accomplishes the welfare of beings by means of the method of the various vehicles,üîΩhe is the one who thinks about the welfare of beings by means of the various vehicles.

original: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //

original: 'gro ba'i don la rtog pa po'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la rtog pa po'o //
translated: The one who is intent on the welfare of the world by means of the various vehicles and methods.

original: theg pa gsum ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa ste /
analyzed: theg pa gsum ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa ste /
translated: The three vehicles are the vehicles of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so forth.

original: de rnams las 'byung bas na theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la'o //üîΩdon dam par ni theg pa la dbye ba @24a * //
analyzed: de rnams las 'byung bas na theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la'o // don dam par ni theg pa la dbye ba @24a * //
translated: Since they arise from those, it is for the renunciation of the three vehicles.

original: yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In the ultimate sense, there is no division in the vehicle.

original: sangs rgyas nyid du 'bras bu gcig pas na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid du 'bras bu gcig pas na /
translated: Since there is a single result in buddhahood,

original: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
analyzed: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúOne abides in the result of the single vehicle.‚Äù

original: zhes bya'o // nyon mongs pa rnams kyi khams ni mig la sogs pa'i rigs te /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // nyon mongs pa rnams kyi khams ni mig la sogs pa'i rigs te /
translated: The element of the afflictions is the type of eye and so forth.

original: pha rol gyi don med pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor med pas na rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag go //
analyzed: pha rol gyi don med pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor med pas na rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag go //
translated: Since there is no object of another, it does not exist as the nature of cause and result. Therefore, the one who is the nature of purity is the one who is pure of the element of the afflictions.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems ni las kyi khams so //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems ni las kyi khams so //
translated: The mind that is motivated by virtuous and nonvirtuous karma is the element of karma.

original: de yang mi skye ba'i chos can nyid du byas pas na las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mi skye ba'i chos can nyid du byas pas na las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa'o //
translated: Since they are made to be the non-arising of dharmas, they are the exhaustion of the elements of karma.

original: chu bo ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: chu bo ni bzhi ste /
translated: The four rivers are

original: 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo'o //
translated: the river of desire, the river of existence, the river of views, and the river of ignorance.

original: de nyid brgal dka' bas na rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: de nyid brgal dka' bas na rgya mtsho'o //
translated: Since they are difficult to cross, they are oceans.

original: de rnams las brgal bas na chu bo'i rgya mtsho kun las brgal ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams las brgal bas na chu bo'i rgya mtsho kun las brgal ba'o //
translated: Since one crosses over them, one has crossed over the oceans of the rivers.

original: sbyor ba ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni bzhi ste /
translated: The four attachments are

original: srid pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: existence and so on.

original: sbyor ba nyid 'jig par byed pas na dgon pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba nyid 'jig par byed pas na dgon pa'o //
translated: Since the attachments themselves are destroyed, they are wildernesses.

original: de rnams las nges par 'byung bas na sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams las nges par 'byung bas na sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba'o //
translated: Since one is liberated from them, one has emerged from the wilderness of attachment.

original: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: The afflictions are desire and so on.

original: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ni khro ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ni khro ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The secondary afflictions are anger and so on.

original: de rnams kun nas bsags pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kun nas bsags pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Since they are completely afflicted, they are completely afflicted.

original: de rnams bag chags bcas par shin tu spangs pa gang yin pa de ni bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams bag chags bcas par shin tu spangs pa gang yin pa de ni bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa'o //
translated: The complete abandonment of these together with their traces is the complete abandonment of the traces.

original: thugs rje chen po dang shes rab dang thabs rnams kyis 'bras bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po dang shes rab dang thabs rnams kyis 'bras bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na /
translated: Because he acts for the sake of the world with great compassion, with wisdom and with skillful means, his action is fruitful and not futile.

original: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
analyzed: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
translated: The great compassion, the wisdom, and the skillful means

original: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
analyzed: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
translated: are the means of accomplishing the aim of the world.

original: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can ni 'du shes so ;
analyzed: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can ni 'du shes so ;
translated: The nature of the grasping of signs is discrimination.

original: /'du shes kyang phyi'i yul med pas mtshan mar 'dzin pa yang med pa nyid ni 'du shes thams cad kyi don spangs pa'i don gyi dgos pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing ngo //
analyzed: /'du shes kyang phyi'i yul med pas mtshan mar 'dzin pa yang med pa nyid ni 'du shes thams cad kyi don spangs pa'i don gyi dgos pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing ngo //
translated: The non-existence of the grasping of signs, because of the non-existence of the external object, is the abandonment of the object of all discriminations.

original: rnam par shes pa'i don ni rnam par shes pa'i yul du brtags pa nyid kyis 'gog par byed pa'i rnam pa 'gag par ston pas na rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i don ni rnam par shes pa'i yul du brtags pa nyid kyis 'gog par byed pa'i rnam pa 'gag par ston pas na rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed do //
translated: The object of consciousness is the object of the consciousnesses. The cessation of the aspect of cessation is taught by the cessation of the object of consciousness.

original: sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi yul la dmigs pas na sems can kun yid yul dang ldan no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi yul la dmigs pas na sems can kun yid yul dang ldan no //
translated: He is the object of the mental consciousness of all sentient beings, thus he is the mental object of all sentient beings.

original: 'gro ba gzhan med pas sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi 'gro ba mkhyen pas na sems can kun gyi yid rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba gzhan med pas sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi 'gro ba mkhyen pas na sems can kun gyi yid rig pa'o //
translated: He knows the mental consciousness of all sentient beings, since there is no other consciousness, thus he is the knower of the mental consciousness of all sentient beings.

original: gzhan yang gcig pur ma zad kyi de'i @24b yid kyi bar la gnas pas na sems can kun gyi yid la gnas so //
analyzed: gzhan yang gcig pur ma zad kyi de'i @24b yid kyi bar la gnas pas na sems can kun gyi yid la gnas so //
translated: Moreover, he is not just one, but he abides in the mental consciousness of all sentient beings, thus he abides in the mental consciousness of all sentient beings.

original: de rnams kyi sems ni de dag sems te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi sems ni de dag sems te /
translated: Their minds are the minds of those sentient beings.

original: de la dmigs pas de dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug go //üîΩsems can thams cad la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyis tshim par byed pas na sems can kun yid tshim par byed do //
analyzed: de la dmigs pas de dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug go // sems can thams cad la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyis tshim par byed pas na sems can kun yid tshim par byed do //
translated: He is engaged in accordance with their minds, since he attains sameness with them by observing them.üîΩHe satisfies all sentient beings with a pleasing form, thus he satisfies the minds of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la don dam pa ston pas yid dga' ba bskyed pas na sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la don dam pa ston pas yid dga' ba bskyed pas na sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba'o //
translated: He generates mental satisfaction in all sentient beings by teaching the ultimate, thus he is the mental satisfaction of all sentient beings.

original: gang grub cing yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa de ni grub pa'i mthar phyin no //
analyzed: gang grub cing yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa de ni grub pa'i mthar phyin no //
translated: The one who has reached the end of the establishment and completion is the one who has reached the end of the establishment.

original: phyi'i don gyi 'khrul pa med pas na log par lta ba'i mtshan nyid can nor ba mi mnga' bas na nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i don gyi 'khrul pa med pas na log par lta ba'i mtshan nyid can nor ba mi mnga' bas na nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'o //
translated: Since there is no error regarding external objects, he has the characteristic of non-error. Since he is not mistaken, he has completely abandoned all mistakes.

original: de nyid kyis na the tshom med pa'i blo'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na the tshom med pa'i blo'o //
translated: For that very reason, he has a mind free from doubt.

original: blang ba dang spang ba dang btang snyoms su bya ba'i don gsum po ston pas na don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo'o //
analyzed: blang ba dang spang ba dang btang snyoms su bya ba'i don gsum po ston pas na don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo'o //
translated: Since he teaches the three objects to be accepted, rejected, and ignored, he has a mind free from doubt regarding the three objects.

original: longs spyod dang thar pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don thams cad la rang dbang yod pa gang yin pa de ni kun don to //
analyzed: longs spyod dang thar pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don thams cad la rang dbang yod pa gang yin pa de ni kun don to //
translated: The one who has independence regarding all objects characterized by enjoyment and liberation is the one who has all objects.

original: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni yon tan gsum ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni yon tan gsum ste /
translated: Emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are the three qualities.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo de gsum yod pa'i bdag nyid can gang yin pa de ni yon tan gsum gyi bdag go //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo de gsum yod pa'i bdag nyid can gang yin pa de ni yon tan gsum gyi bdag go //
translated: The one who has the nature of these three doors of liberation is the one who has the nature of the three qualities.

original: phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five aggregates are form and so on.

original: dus gsum ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus so //
analyzed: dus gsum ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus so //
translated: The three times are the past, future, and present.

original: dus de rnams kyi dus gcig pa gang yin pa de ni gsum ste /
analyzed: dus de rnams kyi dus gcig pa gang yin pa de ni gsum ste /
translated: The single time of those times is the third.

original: dus de rnams kyi phra ba'i gnas skabs sngon dang phyi mar 'byung ba ni skad cig thams cad de /
analyzed: dus de rnams kyi phra ba'i gnas skabs sngon dang phyi mar 'byung ba ni skad cig thams cad de /
translated: The subtle state of those times occurring in the past and future is all moments.

original: de rnams kyi bye brag phyed pas na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bye brag phyed pas na /
translated: Since they are distinguished,

original: phung po lnga don dus gsum du //
analyzed: phung po lnga don dus gsum du //
translated: the five aggregates in reality are the three times.

original: skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
analyzed: skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
translated: All moments are distinguished.

original: ces bya'o // shin tu phul du byung ba ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: ces bya'o // shin tu phul du byung ba ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
translated: Since he possesses the sovereignty of the most excellent wisdom, he is perfect buddhahood in a single moment.

original: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid du mi phyed pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid du mi phyed pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang ngo //
translated: Since he is indivisible in the essence of the body of truth, he is the bearer of the nature of all buddhas.

original: chos kyi sku dang ldan pas na 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lus med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku dang ldan pas na 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lus med pa'o //
translated: Since he possesses the body of truth, he is without a body made of elements.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku kun dang ldan pas na lus te'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku kun dang ldan pas na lus te'o //
translated: The body is the enjoyment body, because it is endowed with all the enjoyments.

original: sprul pa'i sku dang ldan pas na lus kyi mchog go //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku dang ldan pas na lus kyi mchog go //
translated: The supreme body is the emanation body, because it is endowed with that.

original: lus kyi mtha' rtogs pa dang ldan pas na lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi mtha' rtogs pa dang ldan pas na lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: The realization of the body's end is the body's end, because it is endowed with the realization of the body's end.

original: lus kyi mtha' rtogs pa'i tshul gyis na gzugs rnams thams cad kun du ston pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi mtha' rtogs pa'i tshul gyis na gzugs rnams thams cad kun du ston pa'o //
translated: The display of all forms is the manner of realizing the body's end.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ngo bor gyur pas na nor bu chen po'o //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ngo bor gyur pas na nor bu chen po'o //
translated: The great jewel is the nature of the wish-fulfilling jewel, because it fulfills all wishes.

original: @25a * // rin po ches mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan ni rin chen tog go //
analyzed: @25a * // rin po ches mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan ni rin chen tog go //
translated: The jewel crest is Ratnaketu.

original: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par bya ba yin pas na sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par bya ba yin pas na sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba'o //
translated: The realization of all buddhas is the realization of all buddhas, because it is the realization of all the perfect buddhas who are the nature of the Dharma body.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas byang chub bo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas byang chub bo //
translated: The enlightenment of the buddhas is the enlightenment of the buddhas, because it is the nature of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: 'di'i gong na gzhan med pas na bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i gong na gzhan med pas na bla na med pa'o //
translated: It is unsurpassed because there is nothing higher than it.

original: gsang sngags kyi rgyud las byung bas na gsang sngags las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi rgyud las byung bas na gsang sngags las byung ba'o //
translated: It is born from the mantra tantras, thus it is born from mantra.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na yi ge med pa'o //
translated: It is the nature of nondual intuition, thus it is without syllables.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / padma dang / rdo rje'i rigs ni gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / padma dang / rdo rje'i rigs ni gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum yin te /
translated: The families of the Tathagata, Lotus, and Vajra are the three great mantra families.

original: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum pa'o //
translated: It is the three great mantra families because it is their nature.

original: gsang sngags thams cad kyi bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags thams cad kyi bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po'o //
translated: It is the producer of all mantra meanings because it is the cause of the generation of all mantras.

original: rig pa'i ngang tshul can ni thig le chen po ste /
analyzed: rig pa'i ngang tshul can ni thig le chen po ste /
translated: The nature of awareness is the great drop.

original: sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the meaning of the term sattva.

original: yi ge dang sgra skad dang brda thams cad dang bral bas yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge dang sgra skad dang brda thams cad dang bral bas yi ge med pa'o //
translated: It is without syllables because it is free from all syllables, sounds, voices, and signs.

original: stong pa nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na stong pa chen po'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na stong pa chen po'o //
translated: It is the great emptiness because it is the nature of great emptiness.

original: aa ra pa tsa na ste yi ge lnga'i bdag nyid can yin pas na yi ge lnga'o //
analyzed: aa ra pa tsa na ste yi ge lnga'i bdag nyid can yin pas na yi ge lnga'o //
translated: It is the five-syllabled one because it has the nature of the five syllables, a ra pa ca na.

original: thig le stong pa nyid kyi gsang sngags dam pa'i yi ge brgya yin pas na thig le stong pa yi ge brgya'o //
analyzed: thig le stong pa nyid kyi gsang sngags dam pa'i yi ge brgya yin pas na thig le stong pa yi ge brgya'o //
translated: It is the empty drop of a hundred syllables because it is the hundred-syllable mantra of the holy, the empty drop.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pas na rnam pa kun ldan no //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pas na rnam pa kun ldan no //
translated: It is endowed with all aspects because it has various aspects.

original: chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid yin pas na rnam pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid yin pas na rnam pa med pa'o //
translated: It is without aspect because it has the nature of the Dharma body.

original: bcu drug phyed phyed bzhi cha'i lhag mar gyur pa'i zla ba'i thig le ral pa'i cod pan la thogs pas na bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can no //
analyzed: bcu drug phyed phyed bzhi cha'i lhag mar gyur pa'i zla ba'i thig le ral pa'i cod pan la thogs pas na bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can no //
translated: It is the one with the half-moon drop because it is the drop of the moon that remains for half of the half-month.

original: yan lag med pa gang yin pa de ni yan lag med pa ste cha shas med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩbrtsi ba dang grangs kyis bcad pa las 'das pas na /
analyzed: yan lag med pa gang yin pa de ni yan lag med pa ste cha shas med pa zhes bya ba'i don to // brtsi ba dang grangs kyis bcad pa las 'das pas na /
translated: It is the one without parts because it is without parts, meaning without parts.

original: brtsi ba las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: brtsi ba las 'das pa'o //
translated: It is beyond counting because it is beyond being counted and numbered.üîΩIt is beyond enumeration because it is beyond enumeration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa'i rtse mo rnam par mi rtog pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa 'dzin pas na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa'i rtse mo rnam par mi rtog pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa 'dzin pas na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can no //
translated: He is the summit of the fourth meditation, since he is the summit of the fourth meditation, which is the nonconceptual meditation of the summit of existence.

original: de nyid mkhyen pas na bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing ngo //
analyzed: de nyid mkhyen pas na bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing ngo //
translated: He knows the branches of meditation, since he knows the branches of meditation.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Concentration is the concentrations of Heroic Valour and so on.

original: de'i rigs dang rgyud ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
