analyzed: de'i rigs dang rgyud ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Its lineage and continuity is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de mkhyen pas na ting nge 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa'o //
analyzed: de mkhyen pas na ting nge 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa'o //
translated: He knows that, so he knows the lineage and continuity of concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The embodied one in concentration is the body of truth.

original: de nyid sku gnyis pas mchog tu gyur pas na @25b lus kyi mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid sku gnyis pas mchog tu gyur pas na @25b lus kyi mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme body, since that very body is supreme by means of the two bodies.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thams cad du mdzes pas na longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal lo //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thams cad du mdzes pas na longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal lo //
translated: He is the king of all the bodies of perfect rapture, since the body of perfect rapture is beautiful in every way.

original: gang gi phyir mchog tu gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba de nyid kyis na sprul pa'i sku ste sku'i mchog / sangs rgyas pa'i sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mchog tu gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba de nyid kyis na sprul pa'i sku ste sku'i mchog / sangs rgyas pa'i sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ngo //
translated: It holds the stream of the emanation of the Buddha.

original: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //üîΩji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
analyzed: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed // ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
translated: It sends forth various emanations in the ten directions.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It acts for the welfare of beings in accordance with reality.

original: phyogs bcur rnam pa sna tshogs shing du ma'i sprul pa 'gyed pa la brten nas ji lta ba bzhin 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcur rnam pa sna tshogs shing du ma'i sprul pa 'gyed pa la brten nas ji lta ba bzhin 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called that because it acts for the welfare of beings in accordance with reality, in dependence on sending forth various and numerous emanations in the ten directions.

original: la lar ni lha'i dbang por ston pa'o //
analyzed: la lar ni lha'i dbang por ston pa'o //
translated: In some places it manifests as the lord of gods.

original: la lar ni lha'i lha'o //
analyzed: la lar ni lha'i lha'o //
translated: In some places it manifests as the god of gods.

original: lha'i bdag po ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: lha'i bdag po ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i bdag po'o //
translated: The lord of gods is the lord of the gods of Tushita.

original: lha min bdag po ni thags bzangs ris la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha min bdag po ni thags bzangs ris la sogs pa'o //
translated: The lord of demigods is Bali and so on.

original: la lar ni 'chi med dbang po ste /
analyzed: la lar ni 'chi med dbang po ste /
translated: In some places it manifests as the lord of immortality.

original: 'thab bral la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal po'o //
analyzed: 'thab bral la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal po'o //
translated: It is the king of the gods of YƒÅma and so on.

original: lha'i bla ni gza' phur bu'o //
analyzed: lha'i bla ni gza' phur bu'o //
translated: The lord of gods is the planet Venus.

original: 'jigs byed ni drag po'i tshogs so //
analyzed: 'jigs byed ni drag po'i tshogs so //
translated: Bhairava is the assembly of Rudras.

original: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni drag po'o //
analyzed: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni drag po'o //
translated: Mahesvara is Rudra.

original: de dag la sogs pa'i sprul pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa'i sprul pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he acts for the welfare of the world through such emanations.

original: 'khor ba'i bag chags kyi nyes pa med pas na srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i bag chags kyi nyes pa med pas na srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba'o //
translated: He has crossed over the wilderness of cyclic existence because he is free from the faults of the latent tendencies of cyclic existence.

original: 'gro ba la rjes su ston pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba la rjes su ston pas na ston pa'o //
translated: He is a teacher because he teaches the world.

original: gnyis pa med pas na gcig pu'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa med pas na gcig pu'o //
translated: He is unique because he is without a second.

original: 'gro ba'i bla mar gyur pas na 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla mar gyur pas na 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
translated: He is the world's guru because he is the guru of the world.

original: chos kyi sbyin bdag chen por phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su shas cher grags pas na /
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin bdag chen por phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su shas cher grags pas na /
translated: He is the great lord of the Dharma because he is the great lord of the Dharma who is renowned in the worlds of the ten directions.

original: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
translated: He is renowned in the ten directions of the world.

original: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po'o //
translated: He is the great lord of the Dharma.

original: ci zhig mdzad nas bdud 'joms she na //
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad nas bdud 'joms she na //
translated: What does he do to conquer Mara?

original: byams pa'i go chas sku la gyon pas chas byas shing de bzhin nyid du snying rje'i ya lad bgo ba byas nas shes rab kyi ral gri mda' gzhu thogs te g-yul las rgyal bar mdzad do zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: byams pa'i go chas sku la gyon pas chas byas shing de bzhin nyid du snying rje'i ya lad bgo ba byas nas shes rab kyi ral gri mda' gzhu thogs te g-yul las rgyal bar mdzad do zhes sbyar ro //
translated: He is clad in the armor of love, and having girded himself with the sword of wisdom and the bow and arrow of compassion, he is victorious in battle.

original: nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa'i g-yul do las rgyal bar mdzad pas na nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel to //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa'i g-yul do las rgyal bar mdzad pas na nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel to //
translated: He is the dispeller of the battle of afflictions and ignorance, because he is victorious in the battle with afflictions and ignorance.

original: 'jigs pa med pas na dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pas na dpa' bo'o //
translated: He is the hero because he is fearless.

original: bdud kyi dgra yin pas na bdud dgra'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi dgra yin pas na bdud dgra'o //
translated: He is the enemy of Mara because he is the foe of Mara.

original: bdud las rgyal bas na bdud thul ba'o //
analyzed: bdud las rgyal bas na bdud thul ba'o //
translated: He is the conqueror of Mara because he is victorious over Mara.

original: phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud ces grags pa ni bdud bzhi'o //
analyzed: phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud ces grags pa ni bdud bzhi'o //
translated: The four Maras are the Maras of the aggregates, afflictions, death, and the sons of the gods.

original: de rnams kyi 'jigs pa rnams sel cing mthar thug par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'jigs pa rnams sel cing mthar thug par mdzad pas na /
translated: He is the dispeller of the fear of those four, because he has brought them to an end.

original: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed /
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed /
translated: He is the dispeller of the fear of the four Maras.

original: bdud kyi dgra @26a * //
analyzed: bdud kyi dgra @26a * //
translated: He is the enemy of Mara.

original: gcig pur ma zad de /
analyzed: gcig pur ma zad de /
translated: Not only is he the sole enemy of Mara,

original: bcom ldan 'das ni bdud kyi dpung gi bar rnams kyang pham par mdzad pas na bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni bdud kyi dpung gi bar rnams kyang pham par mdzad pas na bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa'o //
translated: The Lord has defeated the hosts of Mara up to the end of the world, therefore he is the vanquisher of the hosts of Mara.

original: de nyid kyis na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi 'dren par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi 'dren par gyur pa'o //
translated: By that very fact he is the perfect Buddha, the leader of the world.

original: mchog tu bla mar gyur pa yin pas na phyag byar 'os pa yin la ;
analyzed: mchog tu bla mar gyur pa yin pas na phyag byar 'os pa yin la ;
translated: He is worthy of the highest worship, therefore he is worthy of worship.

original: de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na /
translated: By that very fact,üîΩhe is worthy of offerings, praise, and homage,

original: mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas //üîΩrtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
analyzed: mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas // rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
translated: always worthy of being honored with bowed heads.

original: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
analyzed: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
translated: He is the most venerable of venerable ones, the most worshipful of worshipful ones, the most praiseworthy of praiseworthy ones, the most exalted of exalted ones.

original: ces bya'o // khams gsum thams cad du gom pa gcig gis bgrod par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod pa'o //üîΩde ltar mkha' ltar mtha' yas te de'i mthar thug pa'i gom pa mnga' bas na mkha' ltar mtha' med pa rnam par gnon zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya'o // khams gsum thams cad du gom pa gcig gis bgrod par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod pa'o //üîΩde ltar mkha' ltar mtha' yas te de'i mthar thug pa'i gom pa mnga' bas na mkha' ltar mtha' med pa rnam par gnon zhes bya'o //
translated: He who has gone in one step over the whole of the three worlds is the one who has gone in one step over the three worlds.üîΩThus, he is the one who has gone to the end of space, who has gone to the end of the world, who has gone to the end of the sphere of existence, who has gone to the end of the arising of the world, who has gone to the end of the cessation of the world, who has gone to the end of the path, who has gone to the end of non-arising, who has gone to the end of non-cessation, who has gone to the end of non-duality, who has gone to the end of non-discrimination, who has gone to the end of non-perception, who has gone to the end of non-thought, who has gone to the end of non-appearance, who has gone to the end of non-existence, who has gone to the end of non-production, who has gone to the end of non-birth, who has gone to the end of non-manifestation, who has gone to the end of non-action, who has gone to the end of non-affliction, who has gone to the end of non-purification, who has gone to the end of non-grasping, who has gone to the end of non-rejection, who has gone to the end of non-abiding, who has gone to the end of non-transmigration, who has gone to the end of non-attainment, who has gone to the end of non-realization, who has gone to the end of non-manifestation, who has gone to the end of non-birth, who has gone to the end of non-cessation, who has gone to the end of non-destruction, who has gone to the end

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The three knowledges of the bodhisattva are as follows:

original: lha'i mig dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / zag pa zag pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i mig dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / zag pa zag pa'o //
translated: the divine eye, recollection of past lives, and the extinction of defilements.

original: rig pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ye shes la zer bas des na ye shes rnam pa gsum dang ldan pas gsum rig go //
analyzed: rig pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ye shes la zer bas des na ye shes rnam pa gsum dang ldan pas gsum rig go //
translated: The term ‚Äúknowledge‚Äù refers to wisdom. Thus, because he possesses three kinds of wisdom, he is called ‚Äúone who possesses the three knowledges.‚Äù

original: bdag dang bdag gir yongs su shes pa'i bag chags thams cad dang bral bas na gtsang ba'i phyir gtsang ma'o //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gir yongs su shes pa'i bag chags thams cad dang bral bas na gtsang ba'i phyir gtsang ma'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúpure‚Äù because he is free from all the propensities to the view of self and the view of mine.

original: nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
translated: He is called ‚Äúclean‚Äù because he is free from all faults.

original: lha'i mig la sogs pa mngon par shes pa drug gang la yod pa de ni mngon shes drug ldan no //
analyzed: lha'i mig la sogs pa mngon par shes pa drug gang la yod pa de ni mngon shes drug ldan no //
translated: He is called ‚Äúone who possesses the six superknowledges‚Äù because he possesses the six superknowledges, such as the divine eye.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa rnams te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa rnams te /
translated: The six recollections are the recollection of the Buddha, the recollection of the Dharma, the recollection of the Sa·πÖgha, the recollection of morality, the recollection of generosity, and the recollection of the deities.

original: de rnams dang ldan pas na rjes dran drug go //
analyzed: de rnams dang ldan pas na rjes dran drug go //
translated: He is endowed with these six recollections.

original: byang chub la sems pa'i sems gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: byang chub la sems pa'i sems gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: He is a Bodhisattva because he has the thought of enlightenment.

original: gzhan gyi don la gcig tu mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don la gcig tu mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: He is a great being because he is devoted to the welfare of others.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi yul la dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul ldan pas na rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi yul la dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul ldan pas na rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
translated: He is a great wonder-worker because he has the magical power of faith in the object of all aspects.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: He is supramundane because he has realized supramundane intuition.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor bas chos kyi sku thugs su chud pa'i mthar thug pas na shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor bas chos kyi sku thugs su chud pa'i mthar thug pas na shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'o //
translated: He has reached the limit of the perfection of wisdom because he has realized the Dharma Body by the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad du de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob pa'o //
translated: He has attained that by wisdom because he has become its very essence in every way.

original: so so rang rig pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis bdag rig pas na bdag rig go //
analyzed: so so rang rig pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis bdag rig pas na bdag rig go //
translated: He is self-aware because he is aware of himself by the principle of the Dharma which is to be realized by each one for himself.

original: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i @26b tshul gyis gzhan rig pas gzhan rig go //
analyzed: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i @26b tshul gyis gzhan rig pas gzhan rig go //
translated: It is the knowledge of other minds because it knows other minds by the method of illusion, etc.

original: bya ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pas na thams cad pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pas na thams cad pa'o //
translated: It is the all-inclusive because it accomplishes all actions.

original: sems cad thams cad la phan par dgongs pas na kun la phan pa'o //
analyzed: sems cad thams cad la phan par dgongs pas na kun la phan pa'o //
translated: It is the all-beneficial because it is intent on the benefit of all living beings.

original: mang pos bkur bas gang zag gi gtso bor gyur pas na gang zag mchog go //
analyzed: mang pos bkur bas gang zag gi gtso bor gyur pas na gang zag mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme person because it is the foremost person, revered by many.

original: thams cad dpe thams cad las 'das pas na dper bya kun las 'das pa ste'o //
analyzed: thams cad dpe thams cad las 'das pas na dper bya kun las 'das pa ste'o //
translated: It is beyond all analogies because it transcends all analogies.

original: nges par legs par 'dod pa rnams la mtho ris dang thar pa'i rgyur gyur pas na de nyid shes par bya ba ste /
analyzed: nges par legs par 'dod pa rnams la mtho ris dang thar pa'i rgyur gyur pas na de nyid shes par bya ba ste /
translated: It is the object of knowledge because it is the cause of heaven and liberation for those who desire final liberation.

original: shes par bya ba de las gzhan med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes par bya ba de las gzhan med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the object of knowledge because there is no other object of knowledge beyond it.

original: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes ma lus pa skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa shes pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag po'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes ma lus pa skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa shes pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag po'o //
translated: It is the dominant result of the knowledge of all the aspects of reality, because it is the cause of the knowledge of all the aspects of reality.

original: dam pa yin pas na mchog go //
analyzed: dam pa yin pas na mchog go //
translated: It is the highest because it is the best.

original: sbyin pa thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin la /
analyzed: sbyin pa thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin la /
translated: The best of all gifts is the gift of the Dharma.

original: de bas na chos kyi sbyin bdag gi gtso bor gyur pas gtso bor chos kyi sbyin bdag ste'o //
analyzed: de bas na chos kyi sbyin bdag gi gtso bor gyur pas gtso bor chos kyi sbyin bdag ste'o //
translated: Therefore, he is the foremost of all givers of the gift of Dharma.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bzhi'o //
translated: The four seals are the great seal, the doctrine seal, the action seal, and the pledge seal.

original: de rnams kyi don ni phyag rgya bzhi'i don te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ni phyag rgya bzhi'i don te /
translated: The meaning of these is the meaning of the four seals.

original: de la phyag rgya chen po ni lha'i sku ste /
analyzed: de la phyag rgya chen po ni lha'i sku ste /
translated: The great seal is the body of the deity.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body of perfect rapture.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The pledge seal is the body of reality.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya ni ngag tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya ni ngag tu brjod pa'o //
translated: The doctrine seal is the verbal expression.

original: las kyi phyag rgya ni bya ba grub pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya ni bya ba grub pa'i sku'o //
translated: The action seal is the body of successful action.

original: de bzhin du 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gyi gnas kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba gsum gyis bgrod par bzhud pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gyi gnas kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba gsum gyis bgrod par bzhud pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
translated: In the same way, the Blessed One Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ is the supreme object of the world's worship, and he is the one who goes forth by the three vehicles of the disciples and so on.

original: de bas na don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal te gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal te gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, he is the supreme meaning, the pure glory, and nothing else.

original: ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: ji ltar shes she na /
translated: How is this known?üîΩFrom the statement:

original: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //üîΩzhes bya ba las shes so //
analyzed: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal // zhes bya ba las shes so //
translated: The glory of the pure, highest goal.

original: 'di dag las kyang shes te /
analyzed: 'di dag las kyang shes te /
translated: This is also known from the statement:

original: 'jig rten gsum na skal ba bzang po nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad rdzogs par mdzad cing dpal dang ldan pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na skal ba bzang po nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad rdzogs par mdzad cing dpal dang ldan pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na /
translated: Since he is the glory of all glories, he fulfills all desired goals in the three worlds with his excellence.

original: 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //üîΩdpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che // dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa /
translated: Therefore, he is the great good fortune of the three worlds.

original: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
translated: He is the glory of all glories, the glory of Manjusri.

original: de nas da ni phyag 'tshal gsungs pa yin te //
analyzed: de nas da ni phyag 'tshal gsungs pa yin te //
translated: Now, the homage is stated:

original: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
analyzed: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, O supreme Vajra, bestower of boons.

original: ces bya ba la mchog ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya ba la mchog ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: Here, the supreme is buddhahood.

original: de stsol bas na mchog sbyin no //
analyzed: de stsol bas na mchog sbyin no //
translated: Since he bestows it, he is the bestower of boons.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pas na rdo rje mchog go //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pas na rdo rje mchog go //
translated: Since he is the chief of the Vajra family, he is the supreme Vajra.

original: de la bod pa ni /üîΩmchog sbyin rdo rje mchog @27a * //
analyzed: de la bod pa ni / mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog @27a * //
translated: The homage is to him:

original: khyod 'dud // ces bya'o //
analyzed: khyod 'dud // ces bya'o //
translated: I bow to you, O supreme Vajra, bestower of boons.

original: yang dag mthar gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag mthar gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The reality limit is thusness.

original: de'i ngo bor gyur pas na yang dag mthar gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bor gyur pas na yang dag mthar gyur ro //
translated: Since it has the nature of that, it is the reality limit.

original: stong pa nyid kyi skye gnas las gang byung ba de ni stong pa nyid las byung ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi skye gnas las gang byung ba de ni stong pa nyid las byung ba'o //
translated: That which has arisen from the birthplace of emptiness is arisen from emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
translated: Buddha enlightenment is unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid pas na sangs rgyas byang chub bo //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid pas na sangs rgyas byang chub bo //
translated: Since it has the nature of that, it is buddha enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi yul la chags pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas chags pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi yul la chags pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas chags pa'o //
translated: The object of attachment of all buddhas is buddha attachment.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa ni 'gro ba rnams 'don pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa ni 'gro ba rnams 'don pa'o //
translated: The desire of the buddhas is to deliver migrating beings.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid pas na sangs rgyas 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid pas na sangs rgyas 'dod pa'o //
translated: Since it has the nature of that, it is buddha desire.

original: sems can rnams kyi don mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgyes pa bskyed pas na sangs rgyas dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgyes pa bskyed pas na sangs rgyas dgyes pa'o //
translated: Since it brings about the delight of the buddhas by completing the aims of sentient beings, it is the delight of the buddhas.

original: sems can rnams theg pa chen po la rab tu 'jog pas dga' ba bskyed pas na sangs rgyas rol pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams theg pa chen po la rab tu 'jog pas dga' ba bskyed pas na sangs rgyas rol pa'o //
translated: It is the Buddha's play because it generates delight by establishing sentient beings in the Great Vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus ston pa'i rgyur 'dzum pa mdzad pas sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'o //üîΩkhro bo'i gzugs la gnas nas gdug pa rnams skrag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus ston pa'i rgyur 'dzum pa mdzad pas sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'o // khro bo'i gzugs la gnas nas gdug pa rnams skrag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: It is the Buddha's smile because it smiles as the cause for showing the body of the bodhisattvas.

original: ha ha zhes bzhad par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: ha ha zhes bzhad par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas bzhad pa'o //
translated: It is the Buddha's laughter because it laughs ha ha in order to frighten the wicked by assuming the form of a wrathful one.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni chos ston pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni chos ston pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The Buddha's speech is the form of teaching the Dharma.

original: 'di yang de bzhin du gyur pas na sangs rgyas gsung ngo //
analyzed: 'di yang de bzhin du gyur pas na sangs rgyas gsung ngo //
translated: Since this is just like that, it is the Buddha's speech.

original: sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The Buddha's mind is the reality of the Buddha.

original: de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud pa'o //
analyzed: de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud pa'o //
translated: It is the homage and bowing to that.

original: 'di la dngos po med pas na dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la dngos po med pas na dngos po med pa'o //
translated: It is non-entity because it does not exist as an entity.

original: de lta na yang sems can gyi don du 'khor bar 'byung bar ston pas na med pa las byung ngo //
analyzed: de lta na yang sems can gyi don du 'khor bar 'byung bar ston pas na med pa las byung ngo //
translated: And yet it is the arising from non-existence because it teaches the arising in cyclic existence for the sake of sentient beings.

original: 'di las sangs rgyas 'byung bas na sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di las sangs rgyas 'byung bas na sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o //
translated: Since the buddhas arise from this, it is the source of the buddhas.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid las nges par 'byung bas na nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid las nges par 'byung bas na nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
translated: Since it arises from the suchness of the Dharma that is equal to space, it is the source of space.

original: gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes las byung bas na ye shes las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes las byung bas na ye shes las byung ba'o //
translated: Since it arises from the wisdom of nondual suchness, it is the source of wisdom.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i spros pa ston pas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i spros pa ston pas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
translated: Since it displays the emanations of the net of illusions, it is the net of illusions.

original: kun rdzob tu sangs rgyas kyi rol pas na sangs rgyas rol ston no //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu sangs rgyas kyi rol pas na sangs rgyas rol ston no //
translated: Since it is the play of the buddhas in the relative, it displays the play of the buddhas.

original: sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa thams cad pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa thams cad pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
translated: I bow down to the nature of all the qualities explained above.

original: de dag thams cad ye shes kyi sku'i mthu las de ltar so sor snang ste /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ye shes kyi sku'i mthu las de ltar so sor snang ste /
translated: All of those appear individually in that way from the power of the wisdom kƒÅya.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore:

original: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, the wisdom kƒÅya.

original: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is stated.

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa /
translated: The Commentary on the Verses That Clearly Define the Five Stages

original: slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes @27b gnyen gyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes @27b gnyen gyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The composition of the great master Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´mitra is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddha ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddha ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
translated: The Indian preceptor ≈öraddhƒÅkaravarma and the great editor-translator, the monk Rinchen Zangpo, revised and finalized this translation.
